######Guangdong Event Navigation
#####SuzukiEvents
#Guangdong Yasuda Investigation Events
#Sony Flavor Events
#Sony ICAC Events
#Sony Oil Crisis Events

#Matsushita Springs the Trap Events
#Guangdong Flavor Events

#####SuzukiEvents

country_event = { #GNG_silicon_dreams_on_the_pearl_river
	id = guangdong.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong.1" }
	title = guangdong.1.t
	desc = guangdong.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_guangzhou

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		add_political_power = 30
	}
}

country_event = { #GNG_the_1962_tokyo_meetings
	id = guangdong.2
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong.2"
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = GNG_PTRG_flavour.1
				days = 5
			}
			country_event = { #Alert
				id = GNG_Econ.0
				days = 305
			}
			country_event = { #Pulse Event
				id = GNG_Econ.1
				days = 365
			}
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_NintendoChain.1
				days = 45
			}
			add_to_variable = { GNG_tokyo_meetings_counter = 1 } #Sets that there has been one Tokyo Meeting
			set_variable = { GNG_days_to_next_product_cycle = 465 }
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = GNG_Product_Cycle.0
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	title = guangdong.2.t
	desc = guangdong.2.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_suzuki_teiichi

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong.2.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_miracle_on_the_pearl_river_intro_tt
		GNG_calculate_target_GDP = yes
		set_country_flag = GNG_Economic_Graphs_Show
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_unlocks_graphs_gui
	}
}

		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong.4
				days = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

				id = guangdong.5
				days = 4
			}

			country_event = { #Yasuda Investigation Start
				id = guangdong_yasudainvestigation.1
				days = 6
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #GNG_identify_the_breakthroughs. The 1962 Product Launch
	id = guangdong.9
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong.9"
		set_country_flag = GNG_1962_product_cycle
	}
	title = guangdong.9.t
	desc = guangdong.9.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_fujitsu_facom_222

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { # Sony
		name = guangdong.9.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		set_variable = { GNG_1962_cycle = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_sony_1962_cycle_intro.tt
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_RnD_temp_id = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_research_monthly_base_temp = 0.75 }
		GNG_research_base_monthly_change = yes
	}

	option = { # Matsushita
		name = guangdong.9.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		set_variable = { GNG_1962_cycle = 2 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_matsushita_1962_cycle_intro.tt
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_RnD_temp_id = 2 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_research_monthly_base_temp = 0.75 }
		GNG_research_base_monthly_change = yes
	}

	option = { # Fujitsu
		name = guangdong.9.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		set_variable = { GNG_1962_cycle = 3 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_fujitsu_1962_cycle_intro.tt
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_RnD_temp_id = 4 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_research_monthly_base_temp = 0.75 }
		GNG_research_base_monthly_change = yes
	}

	option = { # Hitachi
		name = guangdong.9.d
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		set_variable = { GNG_1962_cycle = 4 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_hitachi_1962_cycle_intro.tt
	}
}

country_event = { #GNG_subsidize_the_launch Hitachi
	id = guangdong.10
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong.10" }
	title = guangdong.10.t
	desc = guangdong.10.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_hitachi_hitac_201

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong.10.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_RnD_temp_id = 5 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_research_monthly_base_temp = 0.75 }
		GNG_research_base_monthly_change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_company_temp = 4 }
		set_variable = { GNG_current_product_id = 15 }
		GNG_new_product_cycle_start = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_unlocks_interest_and_quality_decisions
		set_country_flag = GNG_display_hitachi_research
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_display_hitachi_tooltip
	}
}

			}
		}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong.32
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong.32" }
	title = guangdong.32.t
	desc = guangdong.32.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_corruption_generic_1
	timeout_days = 7

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong.32.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_rlso_votes_needed = 55 }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { GNG_rlso_votes_needed = GNG_Current_Ordinance_Votes }
			add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^1 = GNG_rlso_votes_needed }
			add_to_variable = { GNG_corruption_var = GNG_rlso_votes_needed }
			GNG_check_votes_legco = yes
			GNG_clamp_three_evils = yes
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_red_envelope_campaign_tt
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong.64
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong.64"
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_Temp = GNG_legco_suzuki_seats }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_Temp = 12 }
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = GNG_did_trust_matsuzawa
				}
				multiply_temp_variable = { Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_Temp = -1 }
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_Temp }
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 2 }
				GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
				set_variable = { GNG_Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_Temp_tooltip = Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_Temp }
			}
			else = {
				divide_temp_variable = { Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_Temp = 2 }
				round_temp_variable = Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_Temp
				set_temp_variable = { Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_Alt_Temp = Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_Temp }
				set_temp_variable = { Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_2_Temp = Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_Temp }
				multiply_temp_variable = { Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_2_Temp = 2 }
				add_to_temp_variable = { Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_2_Temp = 12 }
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_2_Temp
							value = GNG_legco_suzuki_seats
							compare = greater_than
						}
					}
					subtract_from_temp_variable = { Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_Alt_Temp = 1 }
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_2_Temp
							value = GNG_legco_suzuki_seats
							compare = less_than
						}
					}
					add_to_temp_variable = { Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_Temp = 1 }
				}
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 1 }
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_target_temp = 2 }
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_Temp }
				GNG_change_legco_seats_specific_1 = yes
				multiply_temp_variable = { Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_Alt_Temp = -1 }
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_Alt_Temp }
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 2 }
				GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
				set_variable = { GNG_Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_Temp_tooltip = Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_Temp }
				set_variable = { GNG_Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_Temp_Alt_tooltip = Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_Alt_Temp }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = -1 } #1 = 100%
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 1 }
			GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = -1 } #1 = 100%
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 3 }
			GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = -1 } #1 = 100%
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 4 }
			GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = -1 } #1 = 100%
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 5 }
			GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
		}
	}
	title = guangdong.64.t
	desc = guangdong.64.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_yasuda_investigation

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong.64.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		effect_tooltip = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = GNG_did_trust_matsuzawa
				}
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = GNG_Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_Temp_tooltip }
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 2 }
				GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
			}
			else = {
				custom_effect_tooltip = Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_tt
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 1 }
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_target_temp = 2 }
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = GNG_Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_Temp_tooltip }
				GNG_change_legco_seats_specific_1 = yes
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = GNG_Suzuki_Gets_Fucked_Temp_Alt_tooltip }
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 2 }
				GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = -1 } #1 = 100%
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 1 }
			GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = -1 } #1 = 100%
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 3 }
			GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = -1 } #1 = 100%
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 4 }
			GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = -1 } #1 = 100%
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 5 }
			GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
		}
	}
}

	id = guangdong.121

	}
	title = guangdong.121.t
	desc = guangdong.121.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_morita_akio

	is_triggered_only = yes

			retire_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = paternalism }
			set_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 3 }
			remove_all_ministers = yes
			GNG_rerender_legco = yes
			add_ideas = {
				GNG_Li_Ka_Shing_hog
				GNG_Matsushita_Masaharu_for
				GNG_Stanley_Ho_eco
				GNG_Omori_Kan_sec
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_ai = no }
				news_event = {
					id = WORLD.16601
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong.137
				days = 4
			}
			add_to_variable = { GNG_map_dirty_variable = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { GNG_product_decisions_dirty_variable = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { GNG_3E_dirty_variable = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { GNG_economy_dirty_variable = 0.01 }
			country_event = { id = guangdong_manchukuointeractions.1 days = 7 }
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = despotism
				long_name = GNG_despotism_party_Matsushita_long

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong.137
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong.137" }
	title = guangdong.137.t
	desc = guangdong.137.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_corruption_generic_1

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong.137.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		clr_country_flag = GNG_Yasuda_CRR_Active
		set_country_flag = GNG_silicon_years_active
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = GNG_CRR_salute_morita }
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_general_status_var_temp = 2 }
			GNG_update_status = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_security_status_var_temp = 0 }
			GNG_update_security = yes
			load_focus_tree = GNG_morita_silicon_years
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = GNG_CRR_salute_matsushita }
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_general_status_var_temp = 2 }
			GNG_update_status = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_security_status_var_temp = 0 }
			GNG_update_security = yes
			load_focus_tree = GNG_matsushita_silicon_years
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = GNG_CRR_salute_ibuka }
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_general_status_var_temp = 2 }
			GNG_update_status = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_security_status_var_temp = 0 }
			GNG_update_security = yes
			load_focus_tree = GNG_ibuka_silicon_years
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_remove_laws_yasuda_caretaker_tt
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_RLSO_Delayed_flag
			}
			set_variable = { GNG_labor_standards_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = yasuda_crisis_reimplement_the_rlso_tt
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_completed_focus = GNG_the_morita_plan
				}
				set_temp_variable = { temp_law = token:GNG_morita_plan_law }
				TNO_remove_assorted_law = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_completed_focus = GNG_the_ibuka_plan 
				}
				set_temp_variable = { temp_law = token:GNG_ibuka_plan_law }
				TNO_remove_assorted_law = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { temp_law = token:GNG_yasuda_action_law }
			TNO_remove_assorted_law = yes

			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_manchukuointeractions.1
				days = 24
			}

			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_flavor.26
				days = 7
			}
		}
	}
}

			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_yasudainvestigation.2001
				days = 5
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = investigate_yasuda_payments_tt

		}

			}

			}

	}

#Riots

country_event = { #Guangdong Riots daily event for terror stuff
	id = guangdong_commonRiots.0
	title = guangdong_commonRiots.0.t
	desc = guangdong_commonRiots.0.desc
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_disable_all_mechanics_IJA }
	}
	option = { #
		name = guangdong_commonRiots.0.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_Riots_Active
			}
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_commonRiots.0
				days = 1
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = GNG_riots_240_day_limiter
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { GNG_Riots_Radicalism_Total < 60 }
						check_variable = { GNG_Riots_Strength_Total < 60 }
					}
					has_country_flag = GNG_terror_mission_active
				}
				clr_country_flag = GNG_terror_mission_active
				remove_mission = GNG_the_guangdong_terror
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = GNG_riots_60_day_limiter
					}
					OR = {
						check_variable = { GNG_Riots_Radicalism_Total < 70 }
						check_variable = { GNG_Riots_Strength_Total < 70 }
					}
					has_country_flag = GNG_terror_mission_active
				}
				clr_country_flag = GNG_terror_mission_active
				remove_mission = GNG_the_guangdong_terror
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = GNG_riots_60_day_limiter
						check_variable = { GNG_Riots_Radicalism_Total < 70 }
						check_variable = { GNG_Riots_Strength_Total < 70 }
						has_country_flag = GNG_terror_mission_active
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = GNG_terror_mission_active
				activate_mission = GNG_the_guangdong_terror
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = GNG_riots_240_day_limiter
						check_variable = { GNG_Riots_Radicalism_Total < 60 }
						check_variable = { GNG_Riots_Strength_Total < 60 }
						has_country_flag = GNG_terror_mission_active
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = GNG_terror_mission_active
				activate_mission = GNG_the_guangdong_terror
			}
		}
		else = {
			remove_mission = GNG_the_guangdong_terror
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_commonRiots.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_commonRiots.1" }
	title = guangdong_commonRiots.1.t
	desc = guangdong_commonRiots.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_legco_exterior

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_commonRiots.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 7 }
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_commonRiots.2
				days = 3
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_hitachiRiots.1
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # boom boom the people aren't gonna take it anymore
	id = guangdong_commonRiots.8
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_commonRiots.8" }
	title = guangdong_commonRiots.8.t
	desc = guangdong_commonRiots.8.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_riots_begin

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_commonRiots.8.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		GNG_initialize_riots = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_OC }
			hidden_effect = {
				GNG_PTRG_OC_END = yes
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_Forced_Pullout_PTRG_tt
		}

		hidden_effect = {
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_ai = no }
				news_event = {
					id = WORLD.16605
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						check_variable = {
							GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 7 #Hitachi
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_commonRiots.10
					days = 45
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 7 #Hitachi
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { GNG_hitachi_manchukuoending > GNG_hitachi_komaiending }
					}
					set_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_manchukuoending
					country_event = {
						id = guangdong_hitachiRiots.33
						days = 30
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { GNG_hitachi_komaiending > GNG_hitachi_manchukuoending }
					}
					set_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_komaiending
					country_event = {
						id = guangdong_hitachiRiots.26
						days = 30
					}
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.0
				days = 50
			}
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_IJARiots.0
				days = 60
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 4 #Matsushita
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_matsushitaRiots.2
					days = 2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 5 #Fujitsu
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_fujitsuRiots.1
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	}

country_event = { #to update chance of terror event firing
	id = guangdong_commonRiots.1001
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_commonRiots.1001" }
	title = guangdong_commonRiots.1001.t
	desc = guangdong_commonRiots.1001.desc

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_disable_all_mechanics_IJA }
	}
	option = {
		name = guangdong_commonRiots.1001.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { GNG_riot_event_chance = 0 } }
			set_variable = { GNG_riot_event_chance = 1.5 } # 60/40 chance
			country_event = { id = guangdong_commonRiots.1001 days = 80 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { GNG_riot_event_chance = 1.5 } }
			set_variable = { GNG_riot_event_chance = 2.333 } # 70/30 chance
			country_event = { id = guangdong_commonRiots.1001 days = 80 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { GNG_riot_event_chance = 2.333 } }
			set_variable = { GNG_riot_event_chance = 4 } # 80/20 chance
		}
	}
}

add_namespace = nintendo

country_event = { #Reggie Plays Animal Crossing New Leaf on the Nintendo 3DS
	id = nintendo.64
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event nintendo.64"
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = liberalism
				long_name = GNG_reggie_party_long
				name = GNG_reggie_party
			}
		}
	}

	title = nintendo.64.t
	desc = nintendo.64.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_epic_gaming_win

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = nintendo.64.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = GNG_reggie_filsaime
			promote_leader = yes
			country_leader = {
				ideology = liberalism_subtype
				expire = "2000.1.1"
				id = -1
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = liberalism
			popularity = 1
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = liberalism
		}
		set_cosmetic_tag = GNG_nintendo
	}
}

country_event = { #Reggie Invades Southern China
	id = nintendo.420
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event nintendo.420"
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = liberalism
				long_name = GNG_reggie_OFN_party_long
				name = GNG_reggie_OFN_party
			}
		}
	}

	title = nintendo.420.t
	desc = nintendo.420.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_epic_gaming_win

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = nintendo.420.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = GNG_reggie_filsaime
			promote_leader = yes
			country_leader = {
				ideology = liberalism_subtype
				expire = "2000.1.1"
				id = -1
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = liberalism
			popularity = 1
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = liberalism
		}
		set_cosmetic_tag = GNG_ofn_mandate
		annex_country = {
			target = YUN
			transfer_troops = no
		}
		annex_country = {
			target = GUX
			transfer_troops = no
		}
		transfer_state = 591
		transfer_state = 524
		USA = {
			add_to_faction = GNG
		}
		add_ideas = OFN_Mandate
	}
}

#Riot Negotiations
country_event = { # "Do you want to start negotiations?"
	id = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.1" }
	title = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.1.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_generic_riots_16

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { # Yes!
		name = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_riots_negotiation_yes_warning_tt
		GNG_Proposals_Popup_Open = yes
	}
	option = { # No!
		name = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.1.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		clear_variable = GNG_riot_group_negotiating
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_riots_negotiation_no_warning_tt
	}
}

country_event = { # Protester delegations receives proposal
	id = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.2
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.2" }
	title = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.2.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.2.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_ibuka_overworking

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.2.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }

		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_riot_group_negotiating = 1 }
				}
				set_temp_variable = { strength = GNG_Riots_GFT_Strength }
				set_temp_variable = { radicalism = GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism }
			}
			else = {
				set_temp_variable = { strength = GNG_Riots_CCL_Strength }
				set_temp_variable = { radicalism = GNG_Riots_CCL_Radicalism }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { aver = strength }
			add_to_temp_variable = { aver = radicalism }
			divide_temp_variable = { aver = 2 }
			set_variable = { GNG_Proposals_Acceptable_Value = aver }
			log = "GNG PROPOSALS NEGOTIATIONS: GNG_Proposals_Acceptable_Value == [?GNG_Proposals_Acceptable_Value]"
			log = "GNG PROPOSALS NEGOTIATIONS: GNG_Proposal_Value == [?GNG_Proposal_Value]"

			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = GNG_Proposal_Value
						value = GNG_Proposals_Acceptable_Value
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.3 days = 7 }
			}
			else = {
				set_variable = { GNG_Proposals_Counter_Value = GNG_Proposals_Acceptable_Value }
				divide_variable = { GNG_Proposals_Counter_Value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { GNG_Proposals_Counter_Value = 0.5 } #Ensures demands always round up
				round_variable = GNG_Proposals_Counter_Value
				multiply_variable = { GNG_Proposals_Counter_Value = 10 }
				log = "GNG PROPOSALS NEGOTIATIONS: GNG_Proposals_Counter_Value == [?GNG_Proposals_Counter_Value]"
				country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.4 days = 7 }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Opposition group likes your proposal
	id = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.3
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.3" }
	title = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.3.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.3.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_office_generic_1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.3.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations_3_tt
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_current_ordinance_id > 0 }
			}
			set_country_flag = GNG_riots_negotiations_stall
			country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.21 days = 1 }
		}
		else = {
			country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.9 days = 5 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Opposition group doesn't accept your proposal
	id = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.4
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.4" }
	title = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.4.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.4.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_office_generic_3

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { # Accept the new proposal
		name = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.4.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_variable = { GNG_Proposal_Value = GNG_Proposals_Counter_Value }
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.4.a.tt
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_legco_current_ordinance_id > 0 }
				}
				set_country_flag = GNG_riots_negotiations_stall
				country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.21 days = 1 }
			}
			else = {
				country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.9 days = 5 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Stall for time
		name = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.4.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.6 days = 3 }
		}
	}
	option = { # Walk away
		name = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.4.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.4.c.tt
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.5 days = 3 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.9
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.9"
		set_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_negotiation_support = GNG_Riots_Despair }
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_Riots_Despair < 15 }
			}
			set_variable = { GNG_legco_acceptable_proposal_value = 0 }
		}
		else = {
			set_variable = { GNG_legco_acceptable_proposal_value = 25 }
			add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_acceptable_proposal_value = GNG_legco_seat_negotiation_support }
			subtract_from_variable = { GNG_legco_acceptable_proposal_value = 15 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_acceptable_proposal_value > GNG_Proposal_Value }
			}
			set_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = 55 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_acceptable_proposal_value < GNG_Proposal_Value }
			}
			set_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = 50 }
			subtract_from_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = GNG_Proposal_Value }
			add_to_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = GNG_legco_acceptable_proposal_value }
		}
		set_country_flag = GNG_hide_votes_ordinance
	}
	title = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.9.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.9.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_legco_generic_2

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.9.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 3 } #Sony
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_riot_group_negotiating = 1 } #GFT
				}
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_legco_id = 65 }
				set_country_flag = GNG_legco_vote_days_special
				set_variable = { GNG_legco_vote_days = 10 }
				legco_introduce_ordinance_start = yes
				custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_legco_special_10_days
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_riot_group_negotiating = 2 } #CCL
				}
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_legco_id = 66 }
				set_country_flag = GNG_legco_vote_days_special
				set_variable = { GNG_legco_vote_days = 10 }
				legco_introduce_ordinance_start = yes
				custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_legco_special_10_days
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 4 } #Matsushita
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_riot_group_negotiating = 1 } #GFT
				}
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_legco_id = 67 }
				set_country_flag = GNG_legco_vote_days_special
				set_variable = { GNG_legco_vote_days = 10 }
				legco_introduce_ordinance_start = yes
				custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_legco_special_10_days
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_riot_group_negotiating = 2 } #CCL
				}
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_legco_id = 68 }
				set_country_flag = GNG_legco_vote_days_special
				set_variable = { GNG_legco_vote_days = 10 }
				legco_introduce_ordinance_start = yes
				custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_legco_special_10_days
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 5 } #Fujitsu
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_riot_group_negotiating = 1 } #GFT
				}
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_legco_id = 69 }
				set_country_flag = GNG_legco_vote_days_special
				set_variable = { GNG_legco_vote_days = 10 }
				legco_introduce_ordinance_start = yes
				custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_legco_special_10_days
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_riot_group_negotiating = 2 } #CCL
				}
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_legco_id = 70 }
				set_country_flag = GNG_legco_vote_days_special
				set_variable = { GNG_legco_vote_days = 10 }
				legco_introduce_ordinance_start = yes
				custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_legco_special_10_days
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_negotiations_votes_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.10 days = 4 }
			GNG_negotiations_add_seats = yes
		}
	}
}

	id = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.10
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.10" }

	desc = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.10.desc

	timeout_days = 4

		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }

	}

		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 10 }

			limit = {

			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 65.1 }

				}
				effect_tooltip = {

				}
			}
			else = {
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 65.1 }
				GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
			}
		}

					GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes

			else = {
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 67.1 }

			}
		}
		else_if = {

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.14
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.14" }
	title = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.14.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.14.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_Nagano_Shigeto_Generic_3

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.14.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Japan_Riots_Temp = 15 }
		GNG_Japanese_Intervention_Change = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = CCL_negotiated_negotiations_18
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = GNG_Dismantlement_GFT_OVER
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.18
				days = 3
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GFT_negotiated_negotiations_18
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = GNG_Dismantlement_CCL_OVER
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.18
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
}

	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.18" }

	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.18.a

			limit = {
				has_country_flag = CCL_negotiated_negotiations_18
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Strength_Temp = 10 }
			GNG_Riots_GFT_Strength_Change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism_Temp = 20 }
			GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism_Change = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GFT_negotiated_negotiations_18
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_CCL_Strength_Temp = 10 }
			GNG_Riots_CCL_Strength_Change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_CCL_Radicalism_Temp = 20 }
			GNG_Riots_CCL_Radicalism_Change = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.19
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.19" }
	title = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.19.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.19.desc

			id = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.20
			days = 3
		}
		GNG_fail_ordinance_effect = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_bribing_and_begging_current_ordinance_active
			}
			clr_country_flag = GNG_bribing_and_begging_current_ordinance_active
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.20
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.20" }
	title = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.20.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.20.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_generic_riots_3

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.20.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_riot_group_negotiating = 1 }
			}
			GNG_fail_GFT_negotiation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Strength_Temp = 5 }
			GNG_Riots_GFT_Strength_Change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism_Temp = 5 }
			GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism_Change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_Japan_Riots_Temp = 3 }
			GNG_Japanese_Intervention_Change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_Despair_Temp = 3 }
			GNG_Despair_Change = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_riot_group_negotiating = 2 }
			}
			GNG_fail_CCL_negotiation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_CCL_Strength_Temp = 5 }
			GNG_Riots_CCL_Strength_Change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_CCL_Radicalism_Temp = 5 }
			GNG_Riots_CCL_Radicalism_Change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_Japan_Riots_Temp = 3 }
			GNG_Japanese_Intervention_Change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_Despair_Temp = 3 }
			GNG_Despair_Change = yes
		}
	}
}

	id = guangdong_RiotsNegotiations.21

	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_IJARiots.0" }

	desc = guangdong_IJARiots.0.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_IJA_soldiers_generic

	fire_only_once = yes

		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_IJARiots.0.tt
		set_country_flag = GNG_IJA_InterventionPossible
	}
}

			load_focus_tree = ZZZ_blank_focus
			GNG_IJA_riots_disable_mechanics = yes
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 7 }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_IJARiots.14
					days = 4
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_IJARiots.8
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}

	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_IJARiots.18" }

		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		kill_ideology_leader = fascism
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_IJARiots.18_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			add_country_leader_role = {
				character = GNG_no_authority
				promote_leader = yes
				country_leader = {
					desc = "POLITICS_NO_AUTHORITY_DESC"
					expire = "1999.1.1"
					ideology = fascism_reform_bureaucracy_subtype
					traits = {

					}
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = GNG_Komai_Dead
			remove_all_ministers = yes
			add_ideas = {
				GNG_no_authority_hog
				GNG_no_authority_eco
				GNG_no_authority_for
				GNG_no_authority_sec
			}
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_IJARiots.19
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # The darkest timeline begins
	id = guangdong_IJARiots.19
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_IJARiots.19" }
	title = guangdong_IJARiots.19.t
	desc = guangdong_IJARiots.19.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_IJA_knock_knock

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_IJARiots.19.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		GNG_IJA_Takeover_Effect = yes
		GNG_remove_all_assorted_laws = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = GNG_ija_failstate_achievement
			set_temp_variable = { temp_law = token:GNG_labor_standards_law }
			TNO_remove_assorted_law = yes
			add_to_temp_variable = { temp_law = token:GNG_GFT_protected_status_law }
			TNO_add_assorted_law = yes
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_ai = no }
				news_event = {
					id = WORLD.16607
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_IJAFailstate.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_IJAFailstate.1" }
	title = guangdong_IJAFailstate.1.t
	desc = guangdong_IJAFailstate.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_IJA_trashed_office_room

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_IJAFailstate.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_IJAFailstate.3
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
}

	desc = guangdong_IJAFailstate.33.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_IJA_please_give_me_wings

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_IJAFailstate.33.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_IJAFailstate_Regions_tt
		clr_country_flag = GNG_Google_Maps_Show
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power_holding = 7 }
			}
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_IJAFailstate.35
				days = 5
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_IJAFailstate.34
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
}

	}
	title = guangdong_IJAFailstate.38.t
	desc = guangdong_IJAFailstate.38.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_lam_final

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_IJAFailstate.38.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power_holding = 7 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_IJA_ending_hitachi_message_tt
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_IJA_ending_sad_message_tt
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				GNG = {
					is_ai = no
				}
			}
			TNO_Country_Closing_Screen_Show = yes
		}
	}
}

	id = guangdong_sonyflavor.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_sonyflavor.1" }
	title = guangdong_sonyflavor.1.t
	desc = guangdong_sonyflavor.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_morita_akio_12

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_sonyflavor.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_sonyflavor.1001
				days = 250
			}

			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_sonyflavor.139
				days = 950
			}

			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_sonyflavor.140
				days = 1040
			}
		}
	}
}

	is_triggered_only = yes

			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_sonyflavor.34
				days = 10
			}
		}

	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_sonyflavor.74" }
	title = guangdong_sonyflavor.74.t
	desc = guangdong_sonyflavor.74.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_city_slogan

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_sonyflavor.74.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }

	}
}

country_event = { #ICAC Ordinance
	id = guangdong_sonyflavor.116
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_sonyflavor.116" }
	title = guangdong_sonyflavor.116.t
	desc = guangdong_sonyflavor.116.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_morita_akio_16

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_sonyflavor.116.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_sony_stanley_ICAC_tt
		if = {
			limit = {
				GNG = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = GNG_AI_Guarantee_Pass
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_cheungkong_temp_support = 0.85 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_sony_temp_support = 0.8 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_matsushita_temp_support = 0.65 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_fujitsu_temp_support = 0.4 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_hitachi_temp_support = 0.25 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_legco_id = 23 }
		legco_introduce_ordinance_start = yes
		clr_country_flag = GNG_ordinance_event_blocker
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_sonyAmendment.30
				days = 5
			}
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_sonyAmendment.31
				days = 10
			}
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_sonyAmendment.32
				days = 15
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #
		name = guangdong_sonyflavor.116.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_sony_LKS_ICAC_tt
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_cheungkong_temp_support = 0.80 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_sony_temp_support = 0.75 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_matsushita_temp_support = 0.55 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_fujitsu_temp_support = 0.35 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_hitachi_temp_support = 0.2 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_legco_id = 24 }
		legco_introduce_ordinance_start = yes
		clr_country_flag = GNG_ordinance_event_blocker
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_sonyAmendment.30
				days = 5
			}
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_sonyAmendment.31
				days = 10
			}
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_sonyAmendment.32
				days = 15
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #
		name = guangdong_sonyflavor.116.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_sony_Omori_ICAC_tt
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_cheungkong_temp_support = 0.65 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_sony_temp_support = 0.60 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_matsushita_temp_support = 0.45 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_fujitsu_temp_support = 0.3 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_hitachi_temp_support = 0.15 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_legco_id = 25 }
		legco_introduce_ordinance_start = yes
		clr_country_flag = GNG_ordinance_event_blocker

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_sonyflavor.123
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_sonyflavor.123" }
	title = guangdong_sonyflavor.123.t
	desc = guangdong_sonyflavor.123.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_generic_HK_police_13

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_sonyflavor.123.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_morita_security_bonus_event_tt
		add_to_variable = { GNG_security_morita_focuses_done = 1 }
		set_country_flag = GNG_morita_police_ordinance_new_roe
		add_to_variable = { GNG_public_order_morita_sar_spt = 0.3 }
		add_to_variable = { GNG_public_order_morita_chi_spt = 0.5 }
		set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.15 }
		econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
		add_political_power = -20
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = 1.25 }
			GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { jap_app_temp = -0.75 }
			GNG_japanese_app_change = yes
		}
	}

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_sonyflavor.123.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_morita_security_non_bonus_event_tt
		add_political_power = 25
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = 3 }
		GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 2 }
		GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_sonyflavor.128
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_sonyflavor.128" }
	title = guangdong_sonyflavor.128.t
	desc = guangdong_sonyflavor.128.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_kenpeitai_generic_2

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_sonyflavor.128.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_security_morita_focuses_done < 3 }
				}
				country_event = { #Indifference
					id = guangdong_sonyflavor.131
					days = 5
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_security_morita_focuses_done = 3 }
				}
				country_event = { #Compromise
					id = guangdong_sonyflavor.129
					days = 5
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_security_morita_focuses_done = 4 }
				}
				random_list = {
					1 = {
						country_event = {#Compromise
							id = guangdong_sonyflavor.129
							days = 5
						}
					}
					1 = {
						country_event = {#Melancholy
							id = guangdong_sonyflavor.130
							days = 5
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_security_morita_focuses_done = 5 }
				}
				country_event = { #Melancholy
					id = guangdong_sonyflavor.130
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

#Sony Amendments
country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_sonyAmendment.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_sonyAmendment.1" }
	title = guangdong_sonyAmendment.1.t
	desc = guangdong_sonyAmendment.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_matsushita_4
	trigger = {
		GNG_current_ordinance_has_less_than_5_amendments = yes
	}
	timeout_days = 7
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_sonyAmendment.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
	}
	option = { #
		name = guangdong_sonyAmendment.1.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = 0.3 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 4 }
		GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 11.3 }
		GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 2.5 }
		GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_sonyAmendment.2
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_sonyAmendment.2" }
	title = guangdong_sonyAmendment.2.t
	desc = guangdong_sonyAmendment.2.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_legco_exterior
	trigger = {
		GNG_current_ordinance_has_less_than_5_amendments = yes
	}
	timeout_days = 7
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_sonyAmendment.2.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
	}
	option = { #
		name = guangdong_sonyAmendment.2.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_ordinance_id = 11 }
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 11.1 }
				GNG_ordinance_has_amendment	= yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 11.1 }
			GNG_remove_amendment_from_current = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_ordinance_id = 11 }
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 11.2 }
				GNG_ordinance_has_amendment	= yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 11.2 }
			GNG_remove_amendment_from_current = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = 0.4 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 5 }
		GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 11.4 }
		GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
	}
}

	id = guangdong_sonyAmendment.3

		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 4 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_target_temp = 7 }
		GNG_change_legco_seats_specific_1 = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = 0.4 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 7 }
		GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 7 }
		GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				GNG_is_pearl_river_delta_state = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { ken_spt_temp = 1.5 }
			GNG_kenpeitai_control_change = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 11.5 }
		GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
	}
}

	id = guangdong_sonyAmendment.7
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_sonyAmendment.7" }
	title = guangdong_sonyAmendment.7.t
	desc = guangdong_sonyAmendment.7.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_hitachi_logo_generic_2
	trigger = {
		GNG_current_ordinance_has_less_than_5_amendments = yes
	}
	timeout_days = 7
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_sonyAmendment.7.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }

	}
	option = { #
		name = guangdong_sonyAmendment.7.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_current_ordinance_id = 13 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 13.4 }
			GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = 0.35 }
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 7 }
			GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_current_ordinance_id = 14 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 14.4 }
			GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = 0.45 }
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 7 }
			GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
		}
	}
}

				GNG_ordinance_has_amendment	= yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 14.1 }
			GNG_remove_amendment_from_current = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = -0.3 }
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 6 }
			GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_ordinance_id = 14 }
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 14.2 }
				GNG_ordinance_has_amendment	= yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 14.2 }
			GNG_remove_amendment_from_current = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = -0.3 }
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 3 }
			GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 14.3 }
		GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = 0.25 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 4 }
		GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = 0.2 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 5 }
		GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 3 }
		GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
	}
}

		GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = -0.1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 7 }
		GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
	}
	option = { #

		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 15.1 }
		GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 15.2 }

				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_ordinance_id = 15 }
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 15.2 }

			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 15.2 }
			GNG_remove_amendment_from_current = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 15.3 }
			GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
		}

		name = guangdong_sonyAmendment.18.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_current_ordinance_id = 20 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 20.8 }
			GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = 0.25 }
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 5 }
			GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
			set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.2 }
			econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 3 }
			GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_current_ordinance_id = 27 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 27.3 }
			GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = 0.15 }
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 5 }
			GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
			set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.2 }
			econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 3 }
			GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
		}
	}
	option = { #
		name = guangdong_sonyAmendment.18.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_current_ordinance_id = 20 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 20.8 }
			GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = 0.35 }
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 5 }
			GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
			set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.35 }
			econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 5 }
			GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_current_ordinance_id = 27 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 27.3 }
			GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = 0.25 }
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 5 }
			GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
			set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.35 }
			econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 5 }
			GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
		}
	}
	option = { #
		name = guangdong_sonyAmendment.18.d
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_current_ordinance_id = 20 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 20.8 }
			GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = 0.45 }
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 5 }
			GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
			set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.5 }
			econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 7 }
			GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_current_ordinance_id = 27 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 27.3 }
			GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = 0.35 }
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 5 }
			GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
			set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.5 }
			econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 7 }
			GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
		}
	}

		name = guangdong_sonyAmendment.30.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_current_ordinance_id = 23 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 23.1 }
			GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
			set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.15 }
			econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = 0.15 }
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 4 }
			GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 2 }
			GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_current_ordinance_id = 24 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 24.1 }
			GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
			set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.3 }
			econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = 0.2 }
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 4 }
			GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 4 }
			GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_current_ordinance_id = 25 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 25.2 }
			GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
			set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.5 }
			econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = 0.25 }
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 4 }
			GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes

		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 53.1 }
		GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = 0.1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 3 }
		GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = 0.1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 6 }
		GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
		set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.3 }
		econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 5 }
		GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Immediate Failure
	id = guangdong_sonyICAC.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_sonyICAC.1" }
	title = guangdong_sonyICAC.1.t
	desc = guangdong_sonyICAC.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_corruption_generic_2

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_sonyICAC.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 7.5 }
		GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = -1.5 }
			GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = -1.5 }
			GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
		}
	}
}

			GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { jap_app_temp = -1.25 }
			GNG_japanese_app_change = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = -3 }
		GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_status_var_temp = 2 }
		GNG_update_corruption = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_sonyCasino.2
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_sonyCasino.2" }
	title = guangdong_sonyCasino.2.t
	desc = guangdong_sonyCasino.2.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_generic_HK_police_6

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #let stanley get away with more stuff
		name = guangdong_sonyCasino.2.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_weakens_yokoi_hideki_tt
		add_to_variable = { GNG_yokoi_hideki_power = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { GNG_stanley_ho_power = 1 }
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				GNG_is_pearl_river_delta_state = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { tri_spt_temp = 0.5 }
			GNG_triad_control_change = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 1.5 }
		GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_opinion_temp_var = 1 }
		GNG_China_opinion_change = yes
		add_political_power = -25
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 3 }
		GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
	}

	option = { #hell no we have standards
		name = guangdong_sonyCasino.2.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_strengthens_yokoi_hideki_tt
		add_political_power = 25
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { sar_spt_temp = 0.75 }
			GNG_police_control_change = yes
		}
	}
}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

		name = guangdong_sonyCasino.11.a

		GNG_ordinances_effects = yes
		set_country_flag = GNG_Yokoi_Casino_Success
		set_temp_variable = { temp_law = token:GNG_sony_makao_hideki_law }

	}

	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_sonyOC.16" }
	title = guangdong_sonyOC.16.t
	desc = guangdong_sonyOC.16.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_morita_akio_working_1

	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_sonyOC.16.a

			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = GNG_SONY option = GNG_SONY_MORITA_SUCCESS }
					has_game_rule = { rule = GNG_SONY option = GNG_SONY_MORITA_FAILURE }
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = GNG_like_no_other_chosen
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_like_no_other_chosen_tooltip
	}
	option = {
		name = guangdong_sonyOC.16.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = GNG_SONY option = GNG_SONY_LI_SUCCESS }
					has_game_rule = { rule = GNG_SONY option = GNG_SONY_LI_FAILURE }
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = GNG_we_only_do_everything_chosen
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_we_only_do_everything_chosen_tooltip
	}
}

			set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = -2 }
			GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = -2 }
			GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_sonyOC.46
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_sonyOC.46" }
	title = guangdong_sonyOC.46.t
	desc = guangdong_sonyOC.46.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_Generic_Taxes_1

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_sonyOC.46.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_debt_taxes_chosen
				has_country_flag = GNG_public_finance_ordinance_passed
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_sonyOC_46_PFO_passed
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_misc_income_temp = 0.25 }
			GNG_misc_income_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_social_costs_temp = 0.25 }
			GNG_social_costs_change = yes
			every_owned_state = {
				set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = 2.5 }
				GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
				set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = 2.5 }
				GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
				set_temp_variable = { jap_app_temp = -1.5 }
				GNG_japanese_app_change = yes
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_debt_taxes_chosen
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_sonyOC_46_PFO_failed
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_social_costs_temp = 0.25 }
			GNG_social_costs_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { inflation_temp = 0.35 }
			econ_inflation_change = yes
			every_owned_state = {
				set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = 1.25 }
				GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
				set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = 1.25 }
				GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_future_fund_chosen
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_sonyOC_46_future_fund
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_misc_income_temp = 0.1 }
			GNG_misc_income_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_social_costs_temp = 0.20 }
			GNG_social_costs_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { gdp_growth_temp = -0.2 }
			econ_gdp_growth_change = yes
			every_owned_state = {
				set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = 2 }
				GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
				set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = 1.5 }
				GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_our_corporate_benefactors_chosen
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_sonyOC_46_corporate_benefactors
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_misc_income_temp = 0.1 }
			GNG_misc_income_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_social_costs_temp = 0.20 }
			GNG_social_costs_change = yes
			every_owned_state = {
				set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = 1.25 }
				GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
				set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = 1.25 }
				GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = -1 }
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 3 }
			GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = -1 }
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 6 }
			GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
		}
	}
}

				GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
				set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = 1.5 }
				GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes

			GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes

			GNG_China_opinion_change = yes

			GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_opinion_temp_var = 0.75 }
			GNG_China_opinion_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = 1 }
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 3 }
			GNG_change_legco_seats = yes

	id = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.7
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.7" }
	title = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.7.t
	desc = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.7.desc

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #Maximum Effort
		name = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.7.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = Sonymoritacrisis_7_a_tooltip
		set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.5 }
		econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes

			set_temp_variable = { sar_spt_temp = -3 }
			GNG_police_control_change = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_variable = { GNG_Morita_Personal_Crisis_investigation_points = 2 }
		}
	}

	option = { #Moderate Effort
		name = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.7.b

		set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.25 }
		econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { sar_spt_temp = -2 }
			GNG_police_control_change = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_variable = { GNG_Morita_Personal_Crisis_investigation_points = 1 }
		}
	}

	option = { #Minimum Effort
		name = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.7.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = Sonymoritacrisis_7_c_tooltip

country_event = { #Matsushita's offer
	id = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.10
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.10" }
	title = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.10.t
	desc = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.10.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_tokyotele

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #accept Matsushita's offer
		name = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.10.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.10.a.tt
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = -3 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 3 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_target_temp = 4 }
		GNG_change_legco_seats_specific_1 = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_variable = { GNG_Morita_Personal_Crisis_investigation_points = 2 }
		}
	}

	option = { #reject Matsushita's offer
		name = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.10.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.10.b.tt

	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.11
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.11" }
	title = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.11.t
	desc = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.11.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_tokyotele

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #Matsushita
		name = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.11.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = GNG_SONY option = GNG_SONY_MORITA_SUCCESS }
					has_game_rule = { rule = GNG_SONY option = GNG_SONY_MORITA_FAILURE }
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis_11_a_tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_variable = { GNG_Morita_Personal_Crisis_investigation_points = -1 }
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Morita_Personal_Crisis_investigation_points > 2 }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.12
					days = 6
				}
				set_country_flag = GNG_morita_personal_crisis_good_end
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #Ibuka
		name = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.11.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = GNG_SONY option = GNG_SONY_MORITA_SUCCESS }
					has_game_rule = { rule = GNG_SONY option = GNG_SONY_MORITA_FAILURE }

				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis_11_b_tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_variable = { GNG_Morita_Personal_Crisis_investigation_points = -1 }
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Morita_Personal_Crisis_investigation_points > 2 }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.12
					days = 6
				}
				set_country_flag = GNG_morita_personal_crisis_good_end
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #Not in Guangdong
		name = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.11.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis_11_c_tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_variable = { GNG_Morita_Personal_Crisis_investigation_points = 1 }
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						AND = {
							check_variable = { GNG_Morita_Personal_Crisis_investigation_points > 2 }
							has_game_rule = { rule = GNG_SONY option = DEFAULT }
						}
						has_game_rule = { rule = GNG_SONY option = GNG_SONY_MORITA_SUCCESS }
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.12
					days = 6
				}
				set_country_flag = GNG_morita_personal_crisis_good_end
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.12
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.12" }
	title = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.12.t
	desc = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.12.desc
	picture =GFX_report_event_GNG_tokyotele_hitachi

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.12.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }

	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.13
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.13" }
	title = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.13.t
	desc = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.13.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_tokyotele

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.13.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = GNG_morita_personal_crisis_good_end }
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.14
				days = 10
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_sonyMoritaCrisis.19
				days = 10
			}
		}
	}
}

	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.7
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.7" }
	title = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.7.t
	desc = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.7.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_LKS_family

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #Maximum Effort
		name = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.7.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = Sonylicrisis_7_a_tooltip
		set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.5 }
		econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { sar_spt_temp = -3 }
			GNG_police_control_change = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_variable = { GNG_Li_Personal_Crisis_investigation_points = 2 }
		}
	}

	option = { #Moderate Effort
		name = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.7.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = Sonylicrisis_7_b_tooltip
		set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.25 }
		econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { sar_spt_temp = -2 }
			GNG_police_control_change = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_variable = { GNG_Li_Personal_Crisis_investigation_points = 1 }
		}
	}

	option = { #Minimum Effort
		name = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.7.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }

		set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.1 }
		econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { sar_spt_temp = -1 }
			GNG_police_control_change = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.9
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.9" }
	title = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.9.t
	desc = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.9.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_LKS_family

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.9.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.9.a.tt
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_Stanley_Casino_Success
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.9.a.Stanley_Casino_success_tt
			add_to_variable = { GNG_Li_Personal_Crisis_investigation_points = 2 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_Stanley_Casino_Fail
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.9.a.Stanley_Casino_fail_tt
			add_to_variable = { GNG_Li_Personal_Crisis_investigation_points = 1 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Ibuka has an offer
	id = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.11
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.11" }
	title = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.11.t
	desc = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.11.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_LKS_family

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #Accept Fujitsu's help
		name = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.11.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = GNG_SONY option = GNG_SONY_LI_SUCCESS }
					has_game_rule = { rule = GNG_SONY option = GNG_SONY_LI_FAILURE }
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.11.a.tt
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = -3 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 6 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_target_temp = 5 }
		GNG_change_legco_seats_specific_1 = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_variable = { GNG_Li_Personal_Crisis_investigation_points = 2 }
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Li_Personal_Crisis_investigation_points > 2 }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.12
					days = 6
				}
				set_country_flag = GNG_li_personal_crisis_good_end
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.11.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.11.b.tt
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						AND = {
							check_variable = { GNG_Li_Personal_Crisis_investigation_points > 2 }
							has_game_rule = { rule = GNG_SONY option = DEFAULT }
						}
						has_game_rule = { rule = GNG_SONY option = GNG_SONY_LI_SUCCESS }
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.12
					days = 6
				}
				set_country_flag = GNG_li_personal_crisis_good_end
			}
		}
	}
}

	desc = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.12.desc

	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #

		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.13
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.13" }
	title = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.13.t
	desc = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.13.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_LKS_family

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.13.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = GNG_li_personal_crisis_good_end }
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.14
				days = 10
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_sonyLiCrisis.21
				days = 10
			}
		}
	}
}

	}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_sonyRiots.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_sonyRiots.1" }
	title = guangdong_sonyRiots.1.t
	desc = guangdong_sonyRiots.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_morita_akio_13
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = GNG_Riots_Active
		NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_disable_all_mechanics_IJA }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_sonyRiots.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		country_event = {
			id = guangdong_sonyRiots.2
			days = 4
		}
	}
}

#Matsushita General Flavor Events

country_event = {#Matsushita: First Steps
	id = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaflavor.1" }
	title = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.1.t
	desc = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_matsushita_2

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.1.a
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.50
				days = 180
			}

			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.60
				days = 950
			}

			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.61
				days = 1040
			}
		}
	}
}

	}

country_event = {#Matsushita: -
	id = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.12
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaflavor.12" }
	title = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.12.t
	desc = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.12.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_office_generic_1

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.12.a
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { jap_app_temp = 0.75 }
			GNG_japanese_app_change = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 4 }
		GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
		set_temp_variable = { gdp_growth_temp = 0.1 }
		econ_gdp_growth_change = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.12.b
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = 1.25 }
			GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { jap_app_temp = -0.75 }
			GNG_japanese_app_change = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { gdp_growth_temp = 0.15 }
		econ_gdp_growth_change = yes
	}
}

country_event = {#Matsushita: -
	id = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.13
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaflavor.13" }
	title = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.13.t
	desc = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.13.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_matsushita_6

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.13.a
		set_temp_variable = { gdp_growth_temp = 0.2 }
		econ_gdp_growth_change = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				GNG_is_pearl_river_delta_state = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = -1.25 }
			GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				GNG_is_pearl_river_delta_state = no
			}
			set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = -1.25 }
			GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { jap_app_temp = 1 }
			GNG_japanese_app_change = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = 1.25 }
		GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_opinion_temp_var = -1.5 }
		GNG_China_opinion_change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 2.5 }
		GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.13.b
		set_temp_variable = { gdp_growth_temp = 0.10 }
		econ_gdp_growth_change = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				GNG_is_pearl_river_delta_state = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = 1 }
			GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				GNG_is_pearl_river_delta_state = no
			}
			set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = 1 }
			GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { jap_app_temp = -0.75 }
			GNG_japanese_app_change = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_opinion_temp_var = 2 }
		GNG_China_opinion_change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = -1.25 }
		GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
	}
}
