country_event = {#Matsushita: The Auction - Resounding Success
	id = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.19
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaflavor.19" }
	title = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.19.t
	desc = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.19.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_factory_exterior_generic_1

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.19.a
		set_temp_variable = { money_reserves_temp = 0.7 }
		econ_money_reserves_change_raw_money = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 4 }
		GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
		add_political_power = 30
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_Auction_Failure_Risk = 1 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_matsushita_auction_risk_1
			set_temp_variable = { money_reserves_temp = 0.25 }
			econ_money_reserves_change_raw_money = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_product_quality_temp = 5 }
			GNG_product_cycle_quality_change = yes
			add_political_power = 20
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_Auction_Failure_Risk = 2 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_matsushita_auction_risk_2
			set_temp_variable = { money_reserves_temp = 0.30 }
			econ_money_reserves_change_raw_money = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_product_quality_temp = 10 }
			GNG_product_cycle_quality_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = 1 }
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 4 }
			GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
			add_political_power = 25
		}
	}
}

country_event = {#Matsushita: The Auction - Detrimental Failure
	id = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.20
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaflavor.20" }
	title = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.20.t
	desc = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.20.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_closed_door

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.20.a
		set_temp_variable = { money_reserves_temp = 0.25 }
		econ_money_reserves_change_raw_money = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = -2 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 4 }
		GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = -1.5 }
		GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
		add_political_power = -25
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_Auction_Failure_Risk = 2 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_matsushita_auction_risk_2
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = -1 }
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 4 }
			GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = -3 }
			GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_opinion_temp_var = -1.25 }
			GNG_China_opinion_change = yes
			add_political_power = -50
		}
	}
}

country_event = {#Matsushita: -
	id = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.22
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaflavor.22" }
	title = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.22.t
	desc = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.22.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_fountain_pen_generic

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.22.a
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_social_costs_temp = -0.35 } #1 = 1B
		GNG_social_costs_change = yes
		social_funding_maximal_decrease_high = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { jap_app_temp = 1.5 }
			GNG_japanese_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = -3 }
			GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = -3 }
			GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { sar_spt_temp = -3 }
			GNG_police_control_change = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = 1.5 }
		GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_opinion_temp_var = -1 }
		GNG_China_opinion_change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = -1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 4 }
		GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.22.b
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_social_costs_temp = -0.15 } #1 = 1B
		GNG_social_costs_change = yes
		social_funding_maximal_decrease_low = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { jap_app_temp = 1 }
			GNG_japanese_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = -1.5 }
			GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = -1.5 }
			GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { sar_spt_temp = -1.5 }
			GNG_police_control_change = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = 0.75 }
		GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.22.c
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_social_costs_temp = -0.05 } #1 = 1B
		GNG_social_costs_change = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = 0.75 }
			GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = 0.75 }
			GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { jap_app_temp = -1 }
			GNG_japanese_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { sar_spt_temp = -0.5 }
			GNG_police_control_change = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = {#Matsushita: -
	id = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.23
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaflavor.23" }
	title = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.23.t
	desc = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.23.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_Generic_Taxes_1

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.23.a
		set_temp_variable = { income_tax_temp = 0.025 }
		econ_income_tax_rate_change = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { jap_app_temp = 1 }
			GNG_japanese_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { sar_spt_temp = 1 }
			GNG_police_control_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = -2.5 }
			GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = -2 }
			GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = 1 }
		GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_opinion_temp_var = -1.5 }
		GNG_China_opinion_change = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.23.b
		set_temp_variable = { business_tax_temp = 0.025 }
		econ_business_tax_rate_change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = -1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 4 }
		GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = 2 }
			GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = 2 }
			GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { sar_spt_temp = 1 }
			GNG_police_control_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { jap_app_temp = -3.5 }
			GNG_japanese_app_change = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = -2.5 }
		GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.23.c
		set_temp_variable = { income_tax_temp = 0.03 }
		econ_income_tax_rate_change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { business_tax_temp = 0.03 }
		econ_business_tax_rate_change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = -1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 4 }
		GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { sar_spt_temp = 2.5 }
			GNG_police_control_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = -2.5 }
			GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = -2 }
			GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { jap_app_temp = -3.5 }
			GNG_japanese_app_change = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = -2.5 }
		GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_opinion_temp_var = -1.5 }
		GNG_China_opinion_change = yes
	}
}

country_event = {#Matsushita: Business as Usual
	id = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.30
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaflavor.30" }
	title = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.30.t
	desc = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.30.desc

	is_triggered_only = yes

country_event = {#Matsushita: The Price of Action (Corrupt police officer in Matsushita's Office)
	id = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.37
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaflavor.37" }
	title = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.37.t
	desc = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.37.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_matsushita_4

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {#Suggest early retirement
		name = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.37.a
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { jap_app_temp = -0.5 }
			GNG_japanese_app_change = yes
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				GNG_is_pearl_river_delta_state = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { sar_spt_temp = 0.75 }
			GNG_police_control_change = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = -1.25 }
		GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
	}
	option = {#Make an example of him
		name = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.37.b
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { sar_spt_temp = 1.5 }
			GNG_police_control_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = 2.5 }
			GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = 2 }
			GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { jap_app_temp = -2.5 }
			GNG_japanese_app_change = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = -5 }
		GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_opinion_temp_var = 2.5 }
		GNG_China_opinion_change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = -2 }
		GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
	}
}

	fire_only_once = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_completed_focus = GNG_promote_corporate_security_firms }
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.44
				days = 5
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.45
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {#Matsushita:
	id = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.48
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaflavor.48" }
	title = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.48.t
	desc = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.48.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_Tsuchida_Kuniyasu_Generic_3

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.48.a
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { yak_spt_temp = 1.5 }
			GNG_yakuza_control_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { jap_app_temp = 1.25 }
			GNG_japanese_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = -0.75 }
			GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = 2.5 }
		GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 3 }
		GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_no_corruption_yakuza_tt
		set_country_flag = GNG_matsushita_yakuza_ally
		set_country_flag = GNG_yakuza_corruption_cancelled
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_worked_with_stanley_ho
			}
			clr_country_flag = GNG_worked_with_stanley_ho
			set_country_flag = GNG_worked_with_yokoi_hideki
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_replace_triad_bonus_decisions_with_yakuza
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			GNG_update_underworld_display = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.48.b
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { tri_spt_temp = 1.5 }
			GNG_triad_control_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = 1.25 }
			GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { jap_app_temp = -0.75 }
			GNG_japanese_app_change = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_opinion_temp_var = 2.5 }
		GNG_China_opinion_change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 3 }
		GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_no_corruption_triads_tt
		set_country_flag = GNG_matsushita_triad_ally
		set_country_flag = GNG_triads_corruption_cancelled
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_worked_with_yokoi_hideki
			}
			clr_country_flag = GNG_worked_with_yokoi_hideki
			set_country_flag = GNG_worked_with_stanley_ho
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_replace_yakuza_bonus_decisions_with_triads
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			GNG_update_underworld_display = yes
		}
	}
}

	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.57.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }

	}
}

country_event = { #event choosing paying their fair share or going all in
	id = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.62
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaflavor.62" }
	title = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.62.t
	desc = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.62.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_matsushita_4

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #paying their fair share
		name = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.62.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_country_flag = GNG_matsushita_payingfairshare_chosen
	}

	option = { #going all in
		name = guangdong_matsushitaflavor.62.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_country_flag = GNG_matsushita_goallin_chosen
	}
}

#Matsushita Springs the Trap Events

country_event = { #Who To go After
	id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.1" }
	title = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.1.t
	desc = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_generic_triads_3

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #Target Stanley
		name = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 0.5 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Matsushita_Spring_the_Trap_Choice = 1 }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.2001
					days = 5
				}
				add_to_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Evidence = 1 }
				add_to_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated = 1 }
			}

			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Matsushita_Spring_the_Trap_Choice = 2 }
				}
				random_list = {
					30 = {
						country_event = {
							id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4001
							days = 5
						}
						add_to_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated = 2 }
					}

					70 = {
						country_event = {
							id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.2001
							days = 5
						}
						add_to_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Evidence = 1 }
						add_to_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated = 1 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.1.a.tt
	}

	option = { #Target Yokoi
		name = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.1.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 0.5 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Matsushita_Spring_the_Trap_Choice = 2 }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.3001
					days = 5
				}
				add_to_variable = { GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Evidence = 1 }
				add_to_variable = { GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated = 1 }
			}

			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Matsushita_Spring_the_Trap_Choice = 1 }
				}
				random_list = {
					30 = {
						country_event = {
							id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4001
							days = 5
						}
						add_to_variable = { GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated = 2 }
					}

					70 = {
						country_event = {
							id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.3001
							days = 5
						}
						add_to_variable = { GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Evidence = 1 }
						add_to_variable = { GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated = 1 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.1.b.tt
	}
}

country_event = {#Stanley Success Some
	id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.2001
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.2001" }
	title = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.2001.t
	desc = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.2001.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_stanley_ho

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #dig deeper
		name = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.2001.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 0.33 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Matsushita_Spring_the_Trap_Choice = 1 }
				}
				random_list = {
					20 = {
						country_event = {
							id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4001
							days = 5
						}
						add_to_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated = 1 }
					}

					80 = {
						country_event = {
								id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.2002
								days = 5
						}
						add_to_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Evidence = 1 }
					}
				}
			}

			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Matsushita_Spring_the_Trap_Choice = 2 }
				}
				random_list = {
					30 = {
						country_event = {
						id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4001
						days = 5
						}
						add_to_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated = 1 }
					}

								id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.2002
								days = 5
						}
						add_to_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Evidence = 1 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.2001.a.tt
	}

	option = { #Investigate Yokoi
		name = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.2001.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 0.33 }
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated = 0 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Matsushita_Spring_the_Trap_Choice = 2 }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.3001
					days = 5
				}
				add_to_variable = { GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Evidence = 1 }
				add_to_variable = { GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated = 1 }
			}

			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Matsushita_Spring_the_Trap_Choice = 1 }
				}
				random_list = {
					30 = {
						country_event = {
							id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4001
							days = 5
						}
						add_to_variable = { GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated = 2 }
					}

					70 = {
						country_event = {
							id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.3001
							days = 5
						}
						add_to_variable = { GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Evidence = 1 }
						add_to_variable = { GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated = 1 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.2001.b.tt
	}

	option = { #Confrontation Now
		name = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.2001.c

		hidden_effect = {

		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Matsushita_Spring_the_Trap_Choice = 1 }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.2001
					days = 5
				}
				add_to_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Evidence = 1 }
				add_to_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated = 1 }
			}

			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Matsushita_Spring_the_Trap_Choice = 2 }
				}
				random_list = {
					30 = {
						country_event = {
							id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4001
							days = 5
						}
						add_to_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated = 2 }
					}

					70 = {
						country_event = {
							id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.2001
							days = 5
						}
						add_to_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Evidence = 1 }
						add_to_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated = 1 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.3002.b.tt
	}

	option = { #Confrontation Now
		name = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.3002.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 0.33 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5004
				days = 5
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.3002.c.tt
	}
}

							id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4001

						}

country_event = {#Whoops
	id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4001
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4001" }
	title = {
		text = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4001.t.a
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated = 2
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_yokoi_failure_marker }
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4001.t.b
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated = 2
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_stanley_failure_marker }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4001.desc.a
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated = 2
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_yokoi_failure_marker }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4001.desc.b
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated = 2
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_stanley_failure_marker }
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_yakuza_generic_3

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no

	option = { #Investigate Stanley (Yokoi investigation failed)
		name = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4001.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		trigger = {
				check_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated = 0 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Matsushita_Spring_the_Trap_Choice = 1 }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.2001
					days = 5
				}
				add_to_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Evidence = 1 }
				add_to_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated = 1 }
			}

			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Matsushita_Spring_the_Trap_Choice = 2 }
				}
				random_list = {
					30 = {
						country_event = {
							id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4001
							days = 5
						}
						add_to_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated = 2 }
					}

					70 = {
						country_event = {
							id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.2001
							days = 5
						}
						add_to_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Evidence = 1 }
						add_to_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated = 1 }
					}
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = GNG_yokoi_failure_marker
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4001.a.tt
	}

	option = { #Investigate Yokoi (Ho investigation failed)
		name = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4001.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated = 0 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Matsushita_Spring_the_Trap_Choice = 2 }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.3001
					days = 5
				}
				add_to_variable = { GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Evidence = 1 }
				add_to_variable = { GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated = 1 }
			}

			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Matsushita_Spring_the_Trap_Choice = 1 }
				}
				random_list = {
					30 = {
						country_event = {
							id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4001
							days = 5
						}
						add_to_variable = { GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated = 2 }
					}

					70 = {
						country_event = {
							id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.3001
							days = 5
						}
						add_to_variable = { GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Evidence = 1 }
						add_to_variable = { GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated = 1 }
					}
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = GNG_stanley_failure_marker
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4001.b.tt
	}

	option = { #You're fucked
		name = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4001.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				check_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated = 2 }
				check_variable = { GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated = 2 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4002
				hours = 2
			}
			clr_country_flag = GNG_yokoi_failure_marker
			clr_country_flag = GNG_stanley_failure_marker
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4001.c.tt
	}

	option = { #Confront Ho (Yokoi investigation failed)
		name = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4001.d
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated = 1 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5001
				days = 5
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4001.d.tt
	}

	option = { #Confront Yokoi (Ho investigation failed)

		trigger = {

country_event = { #you're done, do not pass go, do not collect $200
	id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4002
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4002" }
	title = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4002.t
	desc = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4002.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_yakuza_generic_2

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #time to give up, at least it won't go public
		name = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4002.a
		hidden_effect = {
			clear_variable = GNG_Stanley_Ho_Evidence
			clear_variable = GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated
			clear_variable = GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Evidence
			clear_variable = GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated
			clear_variable = GNG_Matsushita_Spring_the_Trap_Choice
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.4002.a.tt
		add_political_power = -30
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				GNG_is_pearl_river_delta_state = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { sar_spt_temp = -2.5 }
			GNG_police_control_change = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #confrontation 1 - Stanley
	id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5001
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5001"
		clr_country_flag = GNG_yokoi_failure_marker
	}
	title = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5001.t
	desc = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5001.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_stanley_ho_2

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #roll the dice
		name = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5001.a
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated = 1 }
			if = {#you only had some evidence
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Evidence = 1 }
				}
				random_list = {
					40 = {
						country_event = {
							id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5002
							days = 2
						}
					}

					60 = {
						country_event = {
							id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5003
							days = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}

			else_if = {#you had more evidence
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Evidence = 2 }
				}
				random_list = {
					30 = {
						country_event = {
							id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5003
							days = 2
						}
					}

					70 = {
						country_event = {
							id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5002
							days = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}

			else_if = { #you had all the evidence
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Evidence = 3 }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5002
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Stanley backs down
	id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5002
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5002" }
	title = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5002.t
	desc = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5002.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_matsushita_4

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #good job, this is all
		name = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5002.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				check_variable = { GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated = 0 }
				AND = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated = 2 }
					check_variable = { GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated = 2 }
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			clear_variable = GNG_Stanley_Ho_Evidence
			clear_variable = GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated
			clear_variable = GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Evidence
			clear_variable = GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated
			clear_variable = GNG_Matsushita_Spring_the_Trap_Choice
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5002.a.tt
		add_political_power = 35
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 4 }
		GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = -5 }
		GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = 2 }
			GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { tri_spt_temp = -3 }
			GNG_triad_control_change = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { temp_law = token:GNG_triad_quiescence_law }
		TNO_add_assorted_law = yes
	}

	option = { #now onto Yokoi
		name = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5002.b
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated = 1 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5004
				days = 2
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5002.b.tt
		add_political_power = 35
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 4 }
		GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = -5 }
		GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = 2 }
			GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { tri_spt_temp = -3 }
			GNG_triad_control_change = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { temp_law = token:GNG_triad_quiescence_law }
		TNO_add_assorted_law = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Stanley walks out
	id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5003
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5003" }
	title = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5003.t
	desc = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5003.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_stanley_ho_5

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #well fuck, guess that's it then
		name = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5003.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				check_variable = { GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated = 0 }
				AND = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated = 2 }
					check_variable = { GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated = 2 }
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			clear_variable = GNG_Stanley_Ho_Evidence
			clear_variable = GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated
			clear_variable = GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Evidence
			clear_variable = GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated
			clear_variable = GNG_Matsushita_Spring_the_Trap_Choice
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5003.a.tt
		add_political_power = -25
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = -1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 4 }
		GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 3 }
		GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = -1.25 }
			GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { tri_spt_temp = 2 }
			GNG_triad_control_change = yes
		}
	}

	option = { #well, onto Yokoi then
		name = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5003.b
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated = 1 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5004
				days = 2
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5003.b.tt
		add_political_power = -25
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = -1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 4 }
		GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 3 }
		GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = -1.25 }
			GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { tri_spt_temp = 2 }
			GNG_triad_control_change = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Yokoi backs down
	id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5005
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5005" }
	title = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5005.t
	desc = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5005.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_yokoi_hideki_generic_2

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #good job, this is all
		name = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5005.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				check_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated = 0 }
				AND = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated = 2 }
					check_variable = { GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated = 2 }
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			clear_variable = GNG_Stanley_Ho_Evidence
			clear_variable = GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated
			clear_variable = GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Evidence
			clear_variable = GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated
			clear_variable = GNG_Matsushita_Spring_the_Trap_Choice
			remove_trait = {
				character = GNG_yokoi_hideki
				trait = eco_guangdongs_fixer
				slot = economy_minister
			}
			add_trait = {
				character = GNG_yokoi_hideki
				trait = eco_guangdongs_fixer_modified
				slot = economy_minister
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_remove_yokoi_hideki_corruption_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5005.a.tt
		add_political_power = 35
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 4 }
		GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = -5 }
		GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = 2 }
			GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { yak_spt_temp = -3 }
			GNG_yakuza_control_change = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { temp_law = token:GNG_yakuza_quiescence_law }
		TNO_add_assorted_law = yes
	}

	option = { #now onto Stanley
		name = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5005.b
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated = 1 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5001
				days = 2
			}
			remove_trait = {
				character = GNG_yokoi_hideki
				trait = eco_guangdongs_fixer
				slot = economy_minister
			}
			add_trait = {
				character = GNG_yokoi_hideki
				trait = eco_guangdongs_fixer_modified
				slot = economy_minister
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_remove_yokoi_hideki_corruption_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5005.b.tt
		add_political_power = 35
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 4 }
		GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = -5 }
		GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = 2 }
			GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { yak_spt_temp = -3 }
			GNG_yakuza_control_change = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { temp_law = token:GNG_yakuza_quiescence_law }
		TNO_add_assorted_law = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Yokoi walks out
	id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5006
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5006" }
	title = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5006.t
	desc = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5006.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_generic_meeting_1

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #well fuck, guess that's it then
		name = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5006.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				check_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated = 0 }
				AND = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated = 2 }
					check_variable = { GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated = 2 }
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			clear_variable = GNG_Stanley_Ho_Evidence
			clear_variable = GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated
			clear_variable = GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Evidence
			clear_variable = GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_Investigated
			clear_variable = GNG_Matsushita_Spring_the_Trap_Choice
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5006.a.tt
		add_political_power = -25
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = -1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 4 }
		GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 3 }
		GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = -1.25 }
			GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { yak_spt_temp = 2 }
			GNG_yakuza_control_change = yes
		}
	}

	option = { #well, onto Stanley then
		name = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5006.b
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { GNG_Stanley_Ho_Investigated = 1 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5001
				days = 2
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_matsushitaspringtrap.5006.b.tt
		add_political_power = -25
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = -1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 4 }
		GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 3 }
		GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = -1.25 }
			GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { yak_spt_temp = 2 }
			GNG_yakuza_control_change = yes
		}
	}
}

		GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes

		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 3 }

	}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_matsushitaAmendment.13
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaAmendment.13" }
	title = guangdong_matsushitaAmendment.13.t
	desc = guangdong_matsushitaAmendment.13.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_fujitsu_type_4_telephone

	timeout_days = 4
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_matsushitaAmendment.13.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }

	}
	option = { #
		name = guangdong_matsushitaAmendment.13.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 74.3 }
		GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = -0.15 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 5 }
		GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = 0.10 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 3 }
		GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = 0.15 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 6 }
		GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_ordinance_for_effective_oversight = 2 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = matsushita_effective_oversight_reduce_strength_tt
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_ordinance_for_effective_oversight = 1 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = matsushita_effective_oversight_reduce_morita_influence_tt
		}
		add_to_variable = { GNG_ordinance_for_effective_oversight = 1 }
	}
}

		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }

		GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = 0.2 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 5 }
		GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = -0.1 }

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_matsushitaOC.4.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_opinion_temp_var = 2 }
		GNG_China_opinion_change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = -2.5 }
		GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
		add_stability = -0.05
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				GNG_is_pearl_river_delta_state = no
			}
			add_manpower = -25000
			set_temp_variable = { chi_pop_temp = -0.5 }
			GNG_chinese_pop_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { zhu_pop_temp = -0.5 }
			GNG_zhujin_pop_change = yes
		}
	}
	option = { #
		name = guangdong_matsushitaOC.4.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = 2 }
		GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_opinion_temp_var = -2.5 }
		GNG_China_opinion_change = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				GNG_is_pearl_river_delta_state = no
			}
			set_temp_variable = { sar_spt_temp = -1.5 }
			GNG_police_control_change = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_matsushitaOC.5
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaOC.5" }
	title = guangdong_matsushitaOC.5.t
	desc = guangdong_matsushitaOC.5.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_HK_Alley_4

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_matsushitaOC.5.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_matsushita_yakuza_ally
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_matsushita_yakuza_ally_tt
			every_owned_state = {
				set_temp_variable = { jap_app_temp = 2.5 }
				GNG_japanese_app_change = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = 2 }
			GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Strength_Temp = -5 }
				GNG_Riots_GFT_Strength_Change = yes
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_CCL_Strength_Temp = -5 }
				GNG_Riots_CCL_Strength_Change = yes
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_Pre_Riots_GFT_Strength_decrease_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_Pre_Riots_CCL_Strength_decrease_tt
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_matsushita_triad_ally
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_matsushita_triad_ally_tt
			every_owned_state = {
				set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = 2.5 }
				GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_opinion_temp_var = 3 }
			GNG_China_opinion_change = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Strength_Temp = -5 }
				GNG_Riots_GFT_Strength_Change = yes
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_CCL_Strength_Temp = -5 }
				GNG_Riots_CCL_Strength_Change = yes
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_Pre_Riots_GFT_Strength_decrease_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_Pre_Riots_CCL_Strength_decrease_tt
		}
	}
}

	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_morita_akio_15
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = GNG_Riots_Active
		NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_disable_all_mechanics_IJA }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_matsushitaRiots.28.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Strength_Temp = -5 }
		GNG_Riots_GFT_Strength_Change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism_Temp = -3.5 }
		GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism_Change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_Despair_Temp = 3.5 }
		GNG_Despair_Change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Japan_Riots_Temp = 1.5 }
		GNG_Japanese_Intervention_change = yes
		GNG_add_matsushita_great_morita_influence = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_matsushitaRiots.40
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaRiots.40" }
	title = guangdong_matsushitaRiots.40.t
	desc = guangdong_matsushitaRiots.40.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_commonRiots126
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = GNG_Riots_Active
		NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_disable_all_mechanics_IJA }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_matsushitaRiots.40.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Strength_Temp = -5 }
		GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism_Change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_CCL_Strength_Temp = -5 }
		GNG_Riots_CCL_Radicalism_Change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_Despair_Temp = 5 }
		GNG_Despair_Change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Japan_Riots_Temp = 3 }
		GNG_Japanese_Intervention_change = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				GNG_is_pearl_river_delta_state = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { govt_spt_temp = -2 }
			GNG_government_control_change = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_matsushitaRiots.41
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaRiots.41" }
	title = guangdong_matsushitaRiots.41.t
	desc = guangdong_matsushitaRiots.41.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_molotov
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = GNG_Riots_Active
		NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_disable_all_mechanics_IJA }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_matsushitaRiots.41.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Strength_Temp = -3 }
		GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism_Change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_CCL_Strength_Temp = -3 }
		GNG_Riots_CCL_Radicalism_Change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism_Temp = 5 }
		GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism_Change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_CCL_Radicalism_Temp = 5 }
		GNG_Riots_CCL_Radicalism_Change = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				GNG_is_pearl_river_delta_state = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { govt_spt_temp = 2 }
			GNG_government_control_change = yes
		}
	}
}

#Matsushita Epilogue

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_matsushitaEpilogue.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaEpilogue.1" }
	title = guangdong_matsushitaEpilogue.1.t
	desc = guangdong_matsushitaEpilogue.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_matsushitaEpilogue_1

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_matsushitaEpilogue.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		country_event = {
			id = guangdong_matsushitaEpilogue.15
			days = 4
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_matsushitaEpilogue.2
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaEpilogue.2" }
	title = guangdong_matsushitaEpilogue.2.t

	fire_only_once = yes

		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		country_event = {
			id = guangdong_matsushitaEpilogue.15
			days = 4
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_matsushitaEpilogue.3
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaEpilogue.3" }
	title = guangdong_matsushitaEpilogue.3.t
	desc = guangdong_matsushitaEpilogue.3.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_smoke_generic

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_matsushitaEpilogue.3.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		country_event = {
			id = guangdong_matsushitaEpilogue.16
			days = 4
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_matsushitaEpilogue.4
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_matsushitaEpilogue.4" }
	title = guangdong_matsushitaEpilogue.4.t
	desc = guangdong_matsushitaEpilogue.4.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_tech_showroom_1

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_matsushitaEpilogue.4.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = Matsushita_Morita_Ending
			}
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_matsushitaEpilogue.25
				days = 4
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = Matsushita_Ibuka_ending
			}
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_matsushitaEpilogue.24
				days = 4
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = Matsushita_Independent_ending
			}
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_matsushitaEpilogue.23
				days = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

		name = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.28.a
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				GNG_is_pearl_river_delta_state = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = -1.5 }
			GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
		}
	}
}

		592 = {

		}
	}

country_event = {#IBUKA CUBE IBUKA CUBE
	id = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.86
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_fujitsuflavor.86" }
	title = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.86.t
	desc = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.86.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_generic_HK_police_5

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.86.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_the_job_prior_focuses_tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = GNG_the_job_big_ambitions
					has_country_flag = GNG_the_job_synergestic_delegation
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.88
					days = 1
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = GNG_the_job_big_ambitions
						has_country_flag = GNG_the_job_synergestic_delegation
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					1 = {
						country_event = {
							id = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.88
							days = 1
						}
					}
					1 = {
						country_event = {
							id = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.89
							days = 1
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.89
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	fire_only_once = yes

		name = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.87.a
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = GNG_the_job_realistic_expectations
					has_country_flag = GNG_the_job_we_will_handle_it
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.90
					days = 1
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = GNG_the_job_realistic_expectations
						has_country_flag = GNG_the_job_we_will_handle_it
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					1 = {
						country_event = {
							id = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.90
							days = 1
						}
					}
					1 = {
						country_event = {
							id = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.91
							days = 1
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.91
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {#IBUKA CUBE IBUKA CUBE
	id = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.88
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_fujitsuflavor.88" }
	title = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.88.t
	desc = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.88.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_generic_HK_police_5

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.88.a
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				GNG_is_pearl_river_delta_state = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = 1.25 } #1 = 1%
			GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { jap_app_temp = 1.25 } #1 = 1%
			GNG_japanese_app_change = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = 1.5 } #1 = 1%
		GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.92 days = 1 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = {#IBUKA CUBE IBUKA CUBE
	id = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.100
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_fujitsuflavor.100" }
	title = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.100.t
	desc = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.100.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_generic_HK_police_5

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.100.a
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				GNG_is_pearl_river_delta_state = no
			}
			set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = -1.5 } #1 = 1%
			GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				GNG_is_pearl_river_delta_state = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { sar_spt_temp = 0.75 } #1 = 1%
			GNG_police_control_change = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_social_costs_temp = -0.05 } #1 = 1B
		GNG_social_costs_change = yes
	}
}

country_event = {#IBUKA CUBE IBUKA CUBE
	id = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.101
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_fujitsuflavor.101" }
	title = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.101.t
	desc = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.101.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_police_fujitsu_militiamen

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.101.a
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				GNG_is_pearl_river_delta_state = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = 1.25 } #1 = 1%
			GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { jap_app_temp = 1.25 } #1 = 1%
			GNG_japanese_app_change = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.102 days = 15 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = {#IBUKA CUBE IBUKA CUBE
	id = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.807
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_fujitsuflavor.807" }
	title = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.807.t
	desc = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.807.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_ibuka_overworking

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.807.a
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 44.1 }
		GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = -1 } #1 = 100%
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 7 }
		GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
		complete_national_focus = GNG_the_guangdong_modern_police_ordinance
	}

	option = {
		name = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.807.b
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 44.2 }
		GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
		set_temp_variable = { h = GNG_legco_hitachi_seats }
		subtract_from_temp_variable = { h = GNG_legco_faction_support^7 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes = h } #1 = 1
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 7 }
		GNG_legco_change_votes = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = -0.9 } #1 = 100%
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 3 }
		GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = -0.9 } #1 = 100%
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 6 }
		GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
		complete_national_focus = GNG_the_guangdong_modern_police_ordinance
	}
}

	title = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.914.t
	desc = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.914.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_ibuka_religion_1
	trigger = {
		check_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 5 }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.914.a
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.915
				days = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {#IBUKA CUBE IBUKA CUBE
	id = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.916
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_fujitsuflavor.916" }
	title = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.916.t
	desc = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.916.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_ibuka_religion_3
	trigger = {
		check_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 5 }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes


	option = {
		name = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.916.a
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_CCL_Radicalism_Temp = 2.5 }
			GNG_Riots_CCL_Radicalism_Change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism_Temp = 2.5 }
			GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism_Change = yes
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_Pre_Riots_GFT_Radicalism_increase_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_Pre_Riots_CCL_Radicalism_increase_tt
	}
	option = {
		name = guangdong_fujitsuflavor.916.b
		add_political_power = -15
		592 = {
			set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = 0.5 }
			GNG_chinese_app_change_specific_state = yes
			set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = 0.5 }
			GNG_zhujin_app_change_specific_state = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = -0.5 } #1 = 1%
		GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
	}
}

		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = GNG_fire_fujitsuOC_10
				}

					id = guangdong_fujitsuOC.10
					days = 25
				}
			}
			else = {
				set_country_flag = GNG_fire_fujitsuOC_10
			}
		}
	}
}

#Fujitsu Riots
country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_fujitsuRiots.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_fujitsuRiots.1" }
	title = guangdong_fujitsuRiots.1.t
	desc = guangdong_fujitsuRiots.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_ibuka_riots
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = GNG_Riots_Active
		NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_disable_all_mechanics_IJA }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = { #
		name = guangdong_fujitsuRiots.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_fujitsuRiots.1.tt
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_fujitsuRiots.11
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_fujitsuRiots.11" }
	title = guangdong_fujitsuRiots.11.t
	desc = guangdong_fujitsuRiots.11.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_broken
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = GNG_Dismantlement_CCL_OVER
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_fujitsu_riots_24_persistence
		add_to_variable = { GNG_Ibuka_Persistence_Point = 3 }

	option = { #

			factor = 1

		}

	}

#Fujitsu Epilogue
country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_fujitsuEpilogue.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_fujitsuEpilogue.1" }
	title = guangdong_fujitsuEpilogue.1.t
	desc = guangdong_fujitsuEpilogue.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_riots_end

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_fujitsuEpilogue.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = CCL_Dismantled_Force
				has_country_flag = Fujitsu_PersistenceEnding
			}
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_fujitsuEpilogue.2
				days = 4
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = CCL_Dismantled_Negotiation
				has_country_flag = Fujitsu_PersistenceEnding
			}
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_fujitsuEpilogue.3
				days = 4
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = CCL_Dismantled_Force
				has_country_flag = Fujitsu_CompromiseEnding
			}
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_fujitsuEpilogue.4
				days = 4
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = CCL_Dismantled_Negotiation
				has_country_flag = Fujitsu_CompromiseEnding
			}
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_fujitsuEpilogue.5
				days = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_fujitsuEpilogue.6
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_fujitsuEpilogue.6"
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_fujitsu_seats_addition = GNG_legco_fujitsu_seats }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_fujitsu_seats_addition = 50 }
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_legco_fujitsu_seats_addition < 0 }
				}
				multiply_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_fujitsu_seats_addition = -1 }
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = GNG_legco_fujitsu_seats_addition }
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 5 }
				GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
				set_variable = { GNG_legco_fujitsu_seats_addition_tooltip = GNG_legco_fujitsu_seats_addition }
			}
		}
	}
	title = guangdong_fujitsuEpilogue.6.t
	desc = guangdong_fujitsuEpilogue.6.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_legco_ibuka_generic

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_fujitsuEpilogue.6.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_fujitsu_seats_addition_tooltip > 0 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = GNG_legco_fujitsu_seats_addition_tooltip }
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 5 }
			GNG_change_legco_seats = no
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_cheungkong_temp_support = 0.00 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_sony_temp_support = 0.00 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_matsushita_temp_support = 0.00 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_fujitsu_temp_support = 1.00 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_hitachi_temp_support = 0.10 }
		set_country_flag = GNG_legco_vote_days_special
		set_variable = { GNG_legco_vote_days = 10 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_legco_id = 55 }
		legco_introduce_ordinance_start = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_fujitsuEpilogue.6.tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_legco_special_10_days
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_fujitsuEpilogue.30
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_fujitsuEpilogue.30"
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = fascism
				long_name = GNG_Ibuka_Fascist_long
				name = GNG_Ibuka_Fascist
			}
		}
	}
	title = guangdong_fujitsuEpilogue.30.t
	desc = guangdong_fujitsuEpilogue.30.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_ibuka_persistence_ending

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_fujitsuEpilogue.30.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_fujitsuEpilogue_30_fascist
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = fascism
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_fujitsu_persistence_ending_thank_you_message_tt
		if = {
			limit = {
				GNG = {
					is_ai = no
				}
			}
			TNO_Country_Closing_Screen_Show = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = GNG_Ibuka_Fascism
			add_country_leader_role = {
				character = GNG_ibuka_masaru # optional if inside character scope
				promote_leader = yes
				country_leader = {
					desc = "POLITICS_IBUKA_MASARU_70S_PERSISTENCE_DESC"
					expire = "1999.1.1"
					ideology = fascism_corporate_statism_subtype
					traits = {
						on_my_own
					}
				}
			}
			legco_set_popularities = yes
			GNG_matsushita_masaharu = {
				promote_character = { ideology = despotism_corporatocracy_subtype }
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = despotism
				long_name = GNG_despotism_party_Matsushita_long
				name = GNG_despotism_party_Matsushita
			}
		}
	}
}

#Hitachi Events

#Hitachi Coup

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.0
	title = guangdong_hitachiCoup.0.t
	desc = guangdong_hitachiCoup.0.desc

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_hitachiCoup.0.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_coup_GUI_active }
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.0
				days = 1
			}
		}
		if = { # doesn't start again after failing. WHY
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_hitachi_seats > 34 }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_coup_thwarted }
				NOT = { has_active_mission = GNG_hitachi_coup }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_coup_triggered }
				has_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_coup_GUI_active # Stops reactivating after coup timer right after coup succeeds
			}
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.28
			}
			set_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_coup_imminent # flag so the coup aborted event works. Makes sure it still knows to fire even if mission is alreaday removed
			activate_mission = GNG_hitachi_coup
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					check_variable = { GNG_legco_hitachi_seats < 35 }
					has_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_coup_thwarted
				}
				has_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_coup_imminent
			}
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.36
			}
			clr_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_coup_imminent
			remove_mission = GNG_hitachi_coup
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_hitachiCoup.1" }
	title = guangdong_hitachiCoup.1.t
	desc = guangdong_hitachiCoup.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_hitachi_logo_generic_2

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_hitachiCoup.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					GNG = {
						is_ai = no
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.0
					days = 1
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_coup_GUI_active
			activate_mission = GNG_growing_hitachi_influence
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_coup_triggered }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { GNG_security_focuses_taken > 7 }
					}
					country_event = {
						id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.3
						days = 7
					}
				}
				else = {
					country_event = {
						id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.2
						days = 7
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = 3 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 7 }
		GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_HC_GUI_revealed_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_HC_GUI_prodcycle_disabled_tt
		add_to_variable = { GNG_HC_cards_revealed = 1 }
	}
}

						days = 7
					}
				}
				else_if = {

					}

						days = 7
					}
				}
			}

		GNG_change_legco_seats_specific_1 = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 7 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_target_temp = 4 }
		GNG_change_legco_seats_specific_1 = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = 1 }

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.10
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_hitachiCoup.10" }
	title = guangdong_hitachiCoup.10.t
	desc = guangdong_hitachiCoup.10.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_hitachi_logo_generic

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_hitachiCoup.10.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = hitachicoup_10_a_tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_coup_triggered }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = GNG_hyperwar_kenpeitai_busted
					}
					country_event = {
						id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.12
						days = 7
					}
				}
				else = {
					country_event = {
						id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.11
						days = 7
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_hitachiCoup.10.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = hitachicoup_10_b_tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_coup_triggered }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						MAN = { has_idea = MAN_Aisin_Gioro_Yuyan_hog }
					}
					country_event = {
						id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.13
						days = 7
					}
				}
				else = {
					country_event = {
						id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.14
						days = 7
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_hitachiCoup.10.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = hitachicoup_10_c_tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_coup_triggered }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { GNG_GDP_target_met_tracker > 1 }
						check_variable = { GNG_Japan_Approval > 65 }
					}
					country_event = {
						id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.15
						days = 7
					}
				}
				else = {
					country_event = {
						id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.16
						days = 7
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_hitachiCoup.10.d
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = hitachicoup_10_d_tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_coup_triggered }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							AND = {
								check_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 3 }
								check_variable = { GNG_China_Opinion > 50 }
							}
							AND = {
								check_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 4 }
								check_variable = { GNG_China_Opinion > 60 }
							}
						}
					}
					country_event = {
						id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.17
						days = 7
					}
				}
				else = {
					country_event = {
						id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.18
						days = 7
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_hitachiCoup.10.e
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = hitachicoup_10_e_tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_coup_triggered }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { GNG_security_focuses_taken > 9 }
					}
					country_event = {
						id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.19
						days = 7
					}
				}
				else = {
					country_event = {
						id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.20
						days = 7
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Success
	id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.17
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_hitachiCoup.17" }
	title = guangdong_hitachiCoup.17.t
	desc = guangdong_hitachiCoup.17.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_Song_Zhiguang_2

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_hitachiCoup.17.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_coup_triggered }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.22
					days = 7
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = -1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 7 }
		GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_opinion_temp_var = 2 }
		GNG_China_opinion_change = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.21
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_hitachiCoup.21" }
	title = guangdong_hitachiCoup.21.t
	desc = guangdong_hitachiCoup.21.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_generic_construction_workers

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_hitachiCoup.21.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_coup_triggered }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.22
					days = 7
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 7 }
		GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				GNG_is_pearl_river_delta_state = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { ken_spt_temp = 3 }
			GNG_kenpeitai_control_change = yes
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				GNG_is_pearl_river_delta_state = no
			}
			set_temp_variable = { ken_spt_temp = 2 }
			GNG_kenpeitai_control_change = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.22
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_hitachiCoup.22" }
	title = guangdong_hitachiCoup.22.t
	desc = guangdong_hitachiCoup.22.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GER_documents

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_hitachiCoup.22.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					GNG = {
						is_ai = no
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_coup_triggered }
					}
					country_event = {
						id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.23
						days = 7
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				random_list = {
					80 = {
						modifier = {
							factor = 0
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = GNG_HITACHI_COUP
								option = GNG_HITACHI_COUP_YES
							}
						}
						country_event = {
							id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.23
							days = 7
						}
					}
					20 = {
						modifier = {
							factor = 0
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = GNG_HITACHI_COUP
								option = GNG_HITACHI_COUP_NO
							}
						}
						country_event = {
							id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.29
							days = 7
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { GNG_HC_cards_revealed = 1 }
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.23
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_hitachiCoup.23" }
	title = guangdong_hitachiCoup.23.t
	desc = guangdong_hitachiCoup.23.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_Nagano_Shigeto_Generic_5

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_hitachiCoup.23.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_coup_triggered }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = GNG_hyperwar_kenpeitai_busted
					}
					country_event = {
						id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.26
						days = 7
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = GNG_hyperwar_yakuza_triads_busted
					}
					country_event = {
						id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.25
						days = 7
					}
				}
				else = {
					country_event = {
						id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.24
						days = 7
					}
				}
			}
			remove_mission = GNG_growing_hitachi_influence
		}
		add_to_variable = { GNG_HC_cards_revealed = 1 }
		set_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_coup_thwarted
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.34
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_hitachiCoup.34" }
	title = guangdong_hitachiCoup.34.t
	desc = guangdong_hitachiCoup.34.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_komai_hitachi

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_hitachiCoup.34.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_mission = GNG_growing_hitachi_influence
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_hitachiCoup.35
				days = 3
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_ai = no }
				news_event = {
					id = WORLD.16604
				}
			}
			set_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 7 }
			GNG_komai_kenichiro = {
				promote_character = { ideology = fascism_reform_bureaucracy_subtype }
			}
			GNG_matsushita_masaharu = {
				remove_advisor_role = { slot = foreign_minister }
				add_advisor_role = {
					advisor = {
						slot = foreign_minister
						idea_token = GNG_Matsushita_Masaharu_Komai_for
						traits = {
							foreign_minister
							for_hitachis_marionette
						}
						ledger = civilian
						cost = -1
					}
				}
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = fascism
				long_name = GNG_ManPlan_long
				name = GNG_ManPlan
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = fascism
			}
			remove_all_ministers = yes
			add_ideas = {
				GNG_Miyazaki_Kiyotaka_hog
				GNG_Matsushita_Masaharu_Komai_for
				GNG_Yokoi_Hideki_eco
				GNG_Tsuchida_Kuniyasu_sec
			}
			load_focus_tree = GNG_komai_silicon_years
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
			add_to_variable = { GNG_map_dirty_variable = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { GNG_product_decisions_dirty_variable = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { GNG_3E_dirty_variable = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { GNG_economy_dirty_variable = 0.01 }
			clr_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_coup_GUI_active
			clr_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_coup_thwarted
			clr_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_coup_triggered
			clr_country_flag = GNG_worked_with_stanley_ho
			clr_country_flag = GNG_worked_with_yokoi_hideki
			clr_country_flag = GNG_triads_corruption_cancelled
			clr_country_flag = GNG_yakuza_corruption_cancelled
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_hitachiCoup.34.tt
	}
}

	}

country_event = {#Komai: The Drone of Decree
	id = guangdong_komaiflavor.4
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_komaiflavor.4" }
	title = guangdong_komaiflavor.4.t
	desc = guangdong_komaiflavor.4.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_Macau_1960_4

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_komaiflavor.4.a
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = -1.25 }
			GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = -1.25 }
			GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
		}
		country_event = {
			id = guangdong_komaiflavor.34
			days = 3

#Hitachi Amendments and Ordinances
country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_hitachiAmendment.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_hitachiAmendment.1" }
	title = guangdong_hitachiAmendment.1.t
	desc = guangdong_hitachiAmendment.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_cigarettes
	timeout_days = 3
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_hitachiAmendment.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }

	}
	option = { #
		name = guangdong_hitachiAmendment.1.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = 0.25 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 4 }
		GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 45.1 }
		GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 4 }
		GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_hitachiAmendment.2
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_hitachiAmendment.2" }
	title = guangdong_hitachiAmendment.2.t
	desc = guangdong_hitachiAmendment.2.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_corruption_generic_2
	timeout_days = 3
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_hitachiAmendment.2.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }

	}
	option = { #
		name = guangdong_hitachiAmendment.2.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = 0.15 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 5 }
		GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 45.2 }
		GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 4 }
		GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_hitachiAmendment.3
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_hitachiAmendment.3" }
