country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_hitachiAmendment.25
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_hitachiAmendment.25"
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { GNG_legco_fujitsu_check = GNG_legco_fujitsu_seats }
			subtract_from_variable = { GNG_legco_fujitsu_check = GNG_legco_faction_support^5 }
			set_variable = { GNG_legco_matsushita_check = GNG_legco_matsushita_seats }
			subtract_from_variable = { GNG_legco_matsushita_check = GNG_legco_faction_support^4 }
			set_variable = { GNG_legco_sony_check = GNG_legco_sony_seats }
			subtract_from_variable = { GNG_legco_sony_check = GNG_legco_faction_support^3 }
			set_variable = { GNG_legco_cheung_kong_check = GNG_legco_cheungkong_seats }
			subtract_from_variable = { GNG_legco_cheung_kong_check = GNG_legco_faction_support^6 }
			set_variable = { GNG_legco_FM_check = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check }
			add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_FM_check = GNG_legco_matsushita_check }
			set_variable = { GNG_legco_FMS_check = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check }
			add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_FMS_check = GNG_legco_matsushita_check }
			add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_FMS_check = GNG_legco_sony_check }
			set_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = 55 }
			subtract_from_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = GNG_Current_Ordinance_Votes }
			set_variable = { GNG_votes_needed_holding = GNG_votes_needed }
		}
	}
	title = guangdong_hitachiAmendment.25.t
	desc = guangdong_hitachiAmendment.25.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_fujitsu_type_4_telephone
	timeout_days = 3
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_hitachiAmendment.25.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 45.4 }
		GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_votes_needed > 0 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { GNG_corruption_var = GNG_votes_needed_holding }
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { GNG_legco_fujitsu_check > GNG_votes_needed }
					}
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^5 = GNG_votes_needed }
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { GNG_legco_FM_check > GNG_votes_needed }
					}
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^5 = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check }
					subtract_from_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check }
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^4 = GNG_votes_needed }
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { GNG_legco_FMS_check > GNG_votes_needed }
					}
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^5 = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check }
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^4 = GNG_legco_matsushita_check }
					subtract_from_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check }
					subtract_from_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = GNG_legco_matsushita_check }
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^3 = GNG_votes_needed }
				}
				else = {
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^5 = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check }
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^4 = GNG_legco_matsushita_check }
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^3 = GNG_legco_sony_check }
					subtract_from_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check }
					subtract_from_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = GNG_legco_matsushita_check }
					subtract_from_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = GNG_legco_sony_check }
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^6 = GNG_votes_needed }
				}
				clear_variable = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check
				clear_variable = GNG_legco_matsushita_check
				clear_variable = GNG_legco_sony_check
				clear_variable = GNG_legco_FM_check
				clear_variable = GNG_legco_FMS_check
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_check_money_var = GNG_votes_needed_holding }
				multiply_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_check_money_var = 0.075 }
				set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = GNG_legco_check_money_var }
				econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
				GNG_check_votes_legco = yes
				GNG_clamp_three_evils = yes
				clear_variable = GNG_votes_needed
				clear_variable = GNG_votes_needed_holding
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { GNG_votes_needed_holding > 0 } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_anomalous_wire_transfers_necessary_tt
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { GNG_votes_needed_holding < 1 } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_anomalous_wire_transfers_unnecessary_tt
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = hitachi_wire_transfer_fire_once
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { temp_law = token:GNG_anomalous_wire_transfers_law }
			TNO_add_assorted_law = yes
			set_country_flag = hitachi_wire_transfer_fire_once
		}
	}
}

				custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_nothing_happens_hitachi_tooltip_tt

		}
	}
	option = { #
		name = guangdong_hitachiAmendment.43.d
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		country_event = {
			id = guangdong_hitachiAmendment.42
			days = 3
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 62.3 }
		GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
		random_list = {
			5 = {
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction = 5 }
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_temp_votes_percentage = 0.1 }
				GNG_legco_change_votes_percentage = yes
			}
			5 = {
				custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_nothing_happens_hitachi_tooltip_tt
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_hitachiAmendment.44
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_hitachiAmendment.44"
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { GNG_legco_fujitsu_check = GNG_legco_fujitsu_seats }
			subtract_from_variable = { GNG_legco_fujitsu_check = GNG_legco_faction_support^5 }
			set_variable = { GNG_legco_matsushita_check = GNG_legco_matsushita_seats }
			subtract_from_variable = { GNG_legco_matsushita_check = GNG_legco_faction_support^4 }
			set_variable = { GNG_legco_sony_check = GNG_legco_sony_seats }
			subtract_from_variable = { GNG_legco_sony_check = GNG_legco_faction_support^3 }
			set_variable = { GNG_legco_cheung_kong_check = GNG_legco_cheungkong_seats }
			subtract_from_variable = { GNG_legco_cheung_kong_check = GNG_legco_faction_support^6 }
			set_variable = { GNG_legco_FM_check = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check }
			add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_FM_check = GNG_legco_matsushita_check }
			set_variable = { GNG_legco_FMS_check = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check }
			add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_FMS_check = GNG_legco_matsushita_check }
			add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_FMS_check = GNG_legco_sony_check }
			set_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = 55 }
			subtract_from_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = GNG_Current_Ordinance_Votes }
			set_variable = { GNG_votes_needed_holding = GNG_votes_needed }
		}
	}
	title = guangdong_hitachiAmendment.44.t
	desc = guangdong_hitachiAmendment.44.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_corruption_generic_2
	timeout_days = 5
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_hitachiAmendment.44.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 57.1 }
		GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_votes_needed > 0 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { GNG_corruption_var = GNG_votes_needed_holding }
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { GNG_legco_fujitsu_check > GNG_votes_needed }
					}
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^5 = GNG_votes_needed }
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { GNG_legco_FM_check > GNG_votes_needed }
					}
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^5 = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check }
					subtract_from_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check }
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^4 = GNG_votes_needed }
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { GNG_legco_FMS_check > GNG_votes_needed }
					}
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^5 = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check }
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^4 = GNG_legco_matsushita_check }
					subtract_from_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check }
					subtract_from_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = GNG_legco_matsushita_check }
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^3 = GNG_votes_needed }
				}
				else = {
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^5 = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check }
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^4 = GNG_legco_matsushita_check }
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^3 = GNG_legco_sony_check }
					subtract_from_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check }
					subtract_from_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = GNG_legco_matsushita_check }
					subtract_from_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = GNG_legco_sony_check }
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^6 = GNG_votes_needed }
				}
				clear_variable = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check
				clear_variable = GNG_legco_matsushita_check
				clear_variable = GNG_legco_sony_check
				clear_variable = GNG_legco_FM_check
				clear_variable = GNG_legco_FMS_check
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_check_money_var = GNG_votes_needed_holding }
				multiply_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_check_money_var = 0.075 }
				set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = GNG_legco_check_money_var }
				econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
				GNG_check_votes_legco = yes
				GNG_clamp_three_evils = yes
				clear_variable = GNG_votes_needed
				clear_variable = GNG_votes_needed_holding
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { GNG_votes_needed_holding > 0 } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_anomalous_wire_transfers_necessary_tt
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { GNG_votes_needed_holding < 1 } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_anomalous_wire_transfers_unnecessary_tt
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = hitachi_wire_transfer_fire_once
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { temp_law = token:GNG_anomalous_wire_transfers_law }
			TNO_add_assorted_law = yes
			set_country_flag = hitachi_wire_transfer_fire_once
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_hitachiAmendment.45
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_hitachiAmendment.45"
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { GNG_legco_fujitsu_check = GNG_legco_fujitsu_seats }

			subtract_from_variable = { GNG_legco_matsushita_check = GNG_legco_faction_support^4 }
			set_variable = { GNG_legco_sony_check = GNG_legco_sony_seats }

			set_variable = { GNG_legco_FM_check = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check }
			add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_FM_check = GNG_legco_matsushita_check }
			set_variable = { GNG_legco_FMS_check = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check }
			add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_FMS_check = GNG_legco_matsushita_check }
			add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_FMS_check = GNG_legco_sony_check }
			set_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = 55 }
			subtract_from_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = GNG_Current_Ordinance_Votes }
			set_variable = { GNG_votes_needed_holding = GNG_votes_needed }
		}
	}
	title = guangdong_hitachiAmendment.45.t
	desc = guangdong_hitachiAmendment.45.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_corruption_generic_2
	timeout_days = 4
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_hitachiAmendment.45.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_amendment_id = 58.4 }
		GNG_add_amendment_to_current = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_votes_needed > 0 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { GNG_corruption_var = GNG_votes_needed_holding }
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { GNG_legco_fujitsu_check > GNG_votes_needed }
					}
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^5 = GNG_votes_needed }
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { GNG_legco_FM_check > GNG_votes_needed }
					}
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^5 = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check }
					subtract_from_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check }
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^4 = GNG_votes_needed }
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { GNG_legco_FMS_check > GNG_votes_needed }
					}
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^5 = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check }
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^4 = GNG_legco_matsushita_check }
					subtract_from_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check }
					subtract_from_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = GNG_legco_matsushita_check }
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^3 = GNG_votes_needed }
				}
				else = {
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^5 = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check }
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^4 = GNG_legco_matsushita_check }
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^3 = GNG_legco_sony_check }
					subtract_from_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check }
					subtract_from_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = GNG_legco_matsushita_check }
					subtract_from_variable = { GNG_votes_needed = GNG_legco_sony_check }
					add_to_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_support^6 = GNG_votes_needed }
				}
				clear_variable = GNG_legco_fujitsu_check
				clear_variable = GNG_legco_matsushita_check
				clear_variable = GNG_legco_sony_check
				clear_variable = GNG_legco_FM_check
				clear_variable = GNG_legco_FMS_check
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_check_money_var = GNG_votes_needed_holding }
				multiply_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_check_money_var = 0.075 }
				set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = GNG_legco_check_money_var }
				econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
				GNG_check_votes_legco = yes
				GNG_clamp_three_evils = yes
				clear_variable = GNG_votes_needed
				clear_variable = GNG_votes_needed_holding
			}
		}

			limit = { check_variable = { GNG_votes_needed_holding > 0 } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_anomalous_wire_transfers_necessary_tt
		}

	id = guangdong_hitachiOC.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_hitachiOC.1" }

	desc = guangdong_hitachiOC.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_read_newspaper

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_hitachiOC.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_hitachiOC.22
				days = 160
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_hitachiRiots.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_hitachiRiots.1" }
	title = guangdong_hitachiRiots.1.t
	desc = guangdong_hitachiRiots.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_generic_riots_12
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_hitachiRiots.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { gdp_growth_temp = -0.75 }
		econ_gdp_growth_change = yes
		country_event = {
			id = guangdong_hitachiRiots.2
			days = 3
		}
	}
}

		has_country_flag = GNG_Riots_Active
		NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_disable_all_mechanics_IJA }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_hitachiRiots.48.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }

	}
}

#Hitachi Epilogue

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_hitachiEpilogue.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_hitachiEpilogue.1" }
	title = guangdong_hitachiEpilogue.1.t
	desc = guangdong_hitachiEpilogue.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_generic_tokyo_police_2

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_hitachiEpilogue.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		country_event = {
			id = guangdong_hitachiEpilogue.2
			days = 4
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_hitachiEpilogue.2
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_hitachiEpilogue.2" }
	title = guangdong_hitachiEpilogue.2.t
	desc = guangdong_hitachiEpilogue.2.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_lonely_girl

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_hitachiEpilogue.2.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_manchukuoending
			}
			set_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_manchukuoending
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_hitachiEpilogue.17
				days = 4
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_hitachi_komaiending
			}
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_hitachiEpilogue.18
				days = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

#Guangdong Flavor Events
country_event = { #1-3 is Chinese New Year
	id = guangdong_flavor.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_flavor.1" }
	title = guangdong_flavor.1.t
	desc = guangdong_flavor.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_cigarettes

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_flavor.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_flavor.3
				days = 354
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_flavor.2
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_flavor.2" }
	title = guangdong_flavor.2.t
	desc = guangdong_flavor.2.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_fireworks

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_flavor.2.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power_holding = 3 }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_flavor.1
					days = 354
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_flavor.3
					days = 354
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = guangdong_flavor.3

		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_flavor.25
				days = 354
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #8 to 15 is early game flavor
	id = guangdong_flavor.8
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_flavor.8" }
	title = guangdong_flavor.8.t
	desc = guangdong_flavor.8.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_legco_generic_1

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_flavor.8.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			GNG_backfill_graphs = yes #backfill the graphs because you cant do it on action thank you paradox
			if = {
				limit = { GNG = { is_ai = no } }
				SHO = {
					add_ideas = GNG_malaya_slower
				}
				MLY = {
					add_ideas = GNG_malaya_slower
				}
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = guangdong_flavor.9
			days = 8
		}
	}
}

#Interactions with Manchukuo

country_event = { # New CE reflects on MCK
	id = guangdong_manchukuointeractions.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_manchukuointeractions.1" }
	title = guangdong_manchukuointeractions.1.t
	desc = guangdong_manchukuointeractions.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_generic_manchukuo_1

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_manchukuointeractions.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_manchukuo_race_is_on_tt
	}
}

country_event = { # Sakomizu - Morita
	id = guangdong_manchukuointeractions.10
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_manchukuointeractions.10" }
	title = guangdong_manchukuointeractions.10.t
	desc = guangdong_manchukuointeractions.10.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_MAN_sakomizu

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_manchukuointeractions.10.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_country_flag = GNG_desperate_economic_decisions_unlocked
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_desperate_measures_manchukuo_race_tt
	}
}

country_event = { # Sejima - Morita
	id = guangdong_manchukuointeractions.14
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_manchukuointeractions.14" }
	title = guangdong_manchukuointeractions.14.t
	desc = guangdong_manchukuointeractions.14.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_MAN_sejima_suit

	id = guangdong_manchukuointeractions.18
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_manchukuointeractions.18"
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = GNG_outraced_manchukuo
		}
	}
	title = guangdong_manchukuointeractions.18.t
	desc = guangdong_manchukuointeractions.18.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_morita_akio_12

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_manchukuointeractions.18.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_outraced_manchukuo_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_outraced_manchukuo_sony_flavor_tt
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = 3 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 3 }
		GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 6 }
		GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = 4 }
			GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = 6 }
			GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { jap_app_temp = 3 }
			GNG_japanese_app_change = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_opinion_temp_var = 10 }
		GNG_China_opinion_change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = 5 }
		GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
	}
}

##LegCo Stuff

country_event = { #LegCo Helper Event
	id = GNG_legco.1
	title = GNG_legco.1.t
	desc = GNG_legco.1.desc

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_disable_all_mechanics_IJA }
	}
	option = { #
		name = GNG_legco.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { GNG_legco_vote_days > 1 } }
			country_event = {
				id = GNG_legco.1
				days = 1
			}
			subtract_from_variable = { GNG_legco_vote_days = 1 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { GNG_legco_vote_days = 1 } }
			set_variable = { GNG_legco_vote_days = 0 }
			legco_bill_conclude = yes
		}
	}
}

### Product Cycle

country_event = { #Daily Product Cycle Date Counter
	id = GNG_Product_Cycle.0
	title = GNG_Product_Cycle.0.t
	desc = GNG_Product_Cycle.0.desc
	hidden = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_disable_all_mechanics_IJA }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = GNG_Product_Cycle.0.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		subtract_from_variable = { GNG_days_to_next_product_cycle = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { GNG_product_decisions_dirty_variable = 0.01 }
		country_event = {
			id = GNG_Product_Cycle.0
			days = 1
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Pulse that checks for the Product Cycle
	id = GNG_Product_Cycle.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_Product_Cycle.1" }
	title = GNG_Product_Cycle.1.t
	desc = GNG_Product_Cycle.1.desc
	hidden = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_disable_all_mechanics_IJA }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = GNG_Product_Cycle.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_tracker = 1 }
		GNG_product_cycle_event_initializer = yes
		set_variable = { GNG_days_to_next_product_cycle = 365 }
		set_variable = { GNG_show_days_to_next_cycle_visible = 0 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Product Cycle ends
	id = GNG_Product_Cycle.2
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_Product_Cycle.2" }
	title = GNG_Product_Cycle.2.t
	desc = GNG_Product_Cycle.2.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_generic_engineers_1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = GNG_Product_Cycle.2.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		GNG_give_product_cycle_effects = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Product Cycle starts
	id = GNG_Product_Cycle.3
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_Product_Cycle.3" }
	title = GNG_Product_Cycle.3.t
	desc = GNG_Product_Cycle.3.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_generic_engineers_2

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { # Sony
		name = GNG_Product_Cycle.3.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 1 }
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 2 }
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 3 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_tracker = 2 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_company_temp = 1 }
			set_variable = { GNG_current_product_id = 16 }
			GNG_new_product_cycle_start = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_tracker = 3 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_company_temp = 1 }
			set_variable = { GNG_current_product_id = 20 }
			GNG_new_product_cycle_start = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_tracker = 4 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_company_temp = 1 }
			set_variable = { GNG_current_product_id = 24 }
			GNG_new_product_cycle_start = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_tracker = 5 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_company_temp = 1 }
			set_variable = { GNG_current_product_id = 28 }
			GNG_new_product_cycle_start = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_tracker = 6 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_company_temp = 1 }
			set_variable = { GNG_current_product_id = 32 }
			GNG_new_product_cycle_start = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_tracker = 7 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_company_temp = 1 }
			set_variable = { GNG_current_product_id = 36 }
			GNG_new_product_cycle_start = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_tracker = 8 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_company_temp = 1 }
			set_variable = { GNG_current_product_id = 40 }
			GNG_new_product_cycle_start = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_tracker = 9 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_company_temp = 1 }
			set_variable = { GNG_current_product_id = 44 }
			GNG_new_product_cycle_start = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_tracker = 10 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_company_temp = 1 }
			set_variable = { GNG_current_product_id = 48 }
			GNG_new_product_cycle_start = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_tracker = 11 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_company_temp = 1 }
			set_variable = { GNG_current_product_id = 52 }
			GNG_new_product_cycle_start = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_tracker = 12 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_company_temp = 1 }
			set_variable = { GNG_current_product_id = 56 }
			GNG_new_product_cycle_start = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_tracker = 13 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_company_temp = 1 }
			set_variable = { GNG_current_product_id = 60 }
			GNG_new_product_cycle_start = yes
		}
	}

	option = { # Matsushita
		name = GNG_Product_Cycle.3.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 1 }
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 2 }
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 4 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_tracker = 2 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_company_temp = 2 }
			set_variable = { GNG_current_product_id = 17 }
			GNG_new_product_cycle_start = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_tracker = 3 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_company_temp = 2 }
			set_variable = { GNG_current_product_id = 21 }
			GNG_new_product_cycle_start = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_tracker = 4 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_company_temp = 2 }
			set_variable = { GNG_current_product_id = 25 }
			GNG_new_product_cycle_start = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_tracker = 5 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_company_temp = 2 }
			set_variable = { GNG_current_product_id = 29 }

		name = GNG_Product_Cycle.3.c

			}

	option = { # Hitachi
		name = GNG_Product_Cycle.3.d
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 1 }
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 2 }

				check_variable = { GNG_product_cycle_tracker = 4 }
				check_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 7 }
			}
		}

			GNG_Corruption_Change = yes

	}

country_event = { #Event that removes the Dynamic Modifier for the Product Cycle
	id = GNG_Product_Cycle.100
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_Product_Cycle.100" }
	title = GNG_Product_Cycle.100.t
	desc = GNG_Product_Cycle.100.desc
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = GNG_Product_Cycle.100.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		remove_dynamic_modifier = {
			modifier = GNG_product_cycle_modifiers
		}
		set_variable = { GNG_Product_Cycle_rGDP_dummy = 0 }
		set_variable = { GNG_Product_Cycle_GDP_growth_dummy = 0 }
		set_variable = { GNG_Product_Cycle_misc_income = 0 }
	}
}

	id = GNG_Product_Cycle_Market.0
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_Product_Cycle_Market.0" }
	title = GNG_Product_Cycle_Market.0.t
	desc = GNG_Product_Cycle_Market.0.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_america_market.1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = GNG_Product_Cycle_Market.0.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_country_flag = GNG_Post_Yasuda_Markets
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_post_yasuda_opening_up_markets_tt
	}
}

	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_Product_Cycle_Market.4" }
	title = GNG_Product_Cycle_Market.4.t
	desc = GNG_Product_Cycle_Market.4.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_america_market.5
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = GNG_Product_Cycle_Market.4.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = GNG
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_market_exhausted_events_5_percent_profitability_decrease
			hidden_effect = {
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_market_temp = 10 }
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_market_profitability_temp = -0.05 }
				GNG_change_market_profitability = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_molotov

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = GNG_Product_Cycle_Market.79.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = GNG
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_market_exhausted_events_5_percent_profitability_decrease
			hidden_effect = {
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_market_temp = 2 }
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_market_profitability_temp = -0.05 }
				GNG_change_market_profitability = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

#LegCo Stuff

country_event = { #1965
	id = GNG_Hitachi_Growth.1
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_Hitachi_Growth.1"
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = GNG_Hitachi_Growth.2
				days = 365
			}
		}
	}
	title = GNG_Hitachi_Growth.1.t
	desc = GNG_Hitachi_Growth.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_hitachi_logo_generic

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = GNG_Hitachi_Growth.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = -3 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = GNG_legco_faction_in_power }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_target_temp = 7 }
		GNG_change_legco_seats_specific_1 = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_Var = 3 }
		GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
		random_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { ken_spt_temp = 2 }
			GNG_kenpeitai_control_change = yes
		}
		random_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { ken_spt_temp = 2 }
			GNG_kenpeitai_control_change = yes
		}
		random_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { ken_spt_temp = 2 }
			GNG_kenpeitai_control_change = yes
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_hitachi_each_year_growth_tt
	}
}

country_event = { #1966
	id = GNG_Hitachi_Growth.2
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_Hitachi_Growth.2"
	}
	title = GNG_Hitachi_Growth.2.t
	desc = GNG_Hitachi_Growth.2.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_hitachi_logo_generic

	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			check_variable = {
				GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 7 #Hitachi
			}
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = GNG_Hitachi_Growth.2.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = -3 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = GNG_legco_faction_in_power }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_target_temp = 7 }
		GNG_change_legco_seats_specific_1 = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_Var = 3 }
		GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
			random_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { ken_spt_temp = 2 }
			GNG_kenpeitai_control_change = yes
		}
		random_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { ken_spt_temp = 2 }
			GNG_kenpeitai_control_change = yes
		}
		random_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { ken_spt_temp = 2 }
			GNG_kenpeitai_control_change = yes
		}
	}
}

		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = 6 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_target_temp = 7 }
		GNG_change_legco_seats_specific_1 = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 5 }
		GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
	}
}

# PTRG EVENTS

country_event = { # Player is told about the potential projects for the Malayan deployment, and that it is time to choose
	id = GNG_PTRG.1
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_PTRG.1"
		hidden_effect = {
			SHO = {
				remove_ideas = GNG_malaya_slower
			}
			MLY = {
				remove_ideas = GNG_malaya_slower
			}
		}
	}
	title = GNG_PTRG.1.t
	desc = GNG_PTRG.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_ptrg_report
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = GNG_PTRG.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				GNG = {
					is_ai = no
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.05 }
			econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
			set_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Select_GUI_3_choices_Visible
			set_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Malaya
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_PTRG.1.tt
			hidden_effect = {
				add_ideas = GNG_volunteer_fix
				activate_mission = GNG_PTRG_deadline
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.05 }
			econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
			set_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Malaya
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_PTRG.1.tt
			hidden_effect = {
				add_ideas = GNG_volunteer_fix
				activate_mission = GNG_PTRG_deadline
			}
			random_list = {
				1 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						OR = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = GNG_PATH
								option = GNG_PATH_THE_ASCENDANT_HEIR
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = GNG_PATH
								option = GNG_PATH_THE_SILICON_VISIONARY
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Malaya
						}
						set_technology = {
							experimental_infantry_equipment_sony_0 = 1
						}
						clr_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Select_GUI_3_choices_Visible
						load_oob = "GNG_Research_Rifles"
						GNG_setup_infantry_missions = yes
						set_variable = { PTRG_rifle_corp_num = 3 }
						set_country_flag = GNG_Sony_Rifle
						set_global_flag = GNG_Sony_Rifle_Global
						set_country_flag = may_send_volunteers
						set_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_deccat_visible
						set_temp_variable = { target = SHO }
						set_temp_variable = { number = 1 }
						TNO_set_num_volunteers = yes
						set_temp_variable = { alert_id = token:Alert_GNG_PTRG }
						add_TNO_alert_unless_exists = yes
						GNG = {
							add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
								type = experimental_infantry_equipment_sony_0
								amount = 100
								producer = GNG
							}
						}
					}
				}
				1 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						OR = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = GNG_PATH
								option = GNG_PATH_THE_GADGETEER_OF_GUANGDONG
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = GNG_PATH
								option = GNG_PATH_THE_SILICON_VISIONARY
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Malaya
						}
						set_technology = {
							experimental_infantry_equipment_matsushita_0 = 1
						}
						clr_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Select_GUI_3_choices_Visible
						load_oob = "GNG_Research_Rifles"
						GNG_setup_infantry_missions = yes
						set_variable = { PTRG_rifle_corp_num = 4 }
						set_country_flag = GNG_Matsushita_Rifle
						set_global_flag = GNG_Matsushita_Rifle_Global
						set_country_flag = may_send_volunteers
						set_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_deccat_visible
						set_temp_variable = { target = SHO }
						TNO_increase_volunteer_cap_1 = yes
						set_temp_variable = { alert_id = token:Alert_GNG_PTRG }
						add_TNO_alert_unless_exists = yes
						GNG = {
							add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
								type = experimental_infantry_equipment_matsushita_0
								amount = 100
								producer = GNG
							}
						}
					}
				}
				1 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						OR = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = GNG_PATH
								option = GNG_PATH_THE_GADGETEER_OF_GUANGDONG
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = GNG_PATH
								option = GNG_PATH_THE_ASCENDANT_HEIR
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Malaya
						}
						set_technology = {
							experimental_infantry_equipment_fujitsu_0 = 1
						}
						clr_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Select_GUI_3_choices_Visible
						load_oob = "GNG_Research_Rifles"
						GNG_setup_infantry_missions = yes
						set_variable = { PTRG_rifle_corp_num = 5 }
						set_country_flag = GNG_Fujitsu_Rifle
						set_global_flag = GNG_Fujitsu_Rifle_Global
						set_country_flag = may_send_volunteers
						set_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_deccat_visible
						set_temp_variable = { target = SHO }
						TNO_increase_volunteer_cap_1 = yes
						set_temp_variable = { alert_id = token:Alert_GNG_PTRG }
						add_TNO_alert_unless_exists = yes
						GNG = {
							add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
								type = experimental_infantry_equipment_fujitsu_0
								amount = 100
								producer = GNG
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Worst possible outcome (0/5 or 1/5)
	id = GNG_PTRG.2
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_PTRG.2" }
	title = GNG_PTRG.2.t
	desc = GNG_PTRG.2.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_japanese_stock_market_3

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = GNG_PTRG.2.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_PTRG_Outcome_Preface_tt
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = -2 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = PTRG_rifle_corp_num }
		GNG_change_legco_seats = yes

		set_temp_variable = { money_reserves_temp = 0.04 }
		econ_money_reserves_change_raw_money = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = GNG_ptrg_profits_dummy
				days = 120
			}
			add_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = GNG_PTRG_profits
				days = 120
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_ptrg_idea
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = GNG_Sony_Rifle_Global }
			CHI = {
				country_event = GNG_PTRG.9
			}
		}
		JAP = {
			country_event = GNG_PTRG.8
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			GNG_JAP_CHI_Rifle_Add = yes
		}
	}
}

		else = {

	id = GNG_PTRG.8
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_PTRG.8" }
	title = GNG_PTRG.8.t
	desc = GNG_PTRG.8.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_HK_generic_3

		hidden_effect = {
			JAP = {
				GNG_JAP_CHI_Rifle_Add = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

				if = {
					limit = {

				else = {
					GNG_JAP_CHI_Rifle_Add = yes
				}

		}
	}

country_event = { #
	id = GNG_PTRG.18
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_PTRG.18" }
	title = GNG_PTRG.18.t
	desc = GNG_PTRG.18.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_Colombian_Civil_War
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_global_flag = YUN_NPA_GAW_Crisis }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Indonesia }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = GNG_PTRG.18.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				GNG = {
					is_ai = no
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.15 }
			econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
			set_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Select_GUI_1_choices_Visible
			set_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Colombia
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_PTRG.18.tt
			hidden_effect = {
				activate_mission = GNG_PTRG_deadline
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.15 }
			econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
			set_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Colombia
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_PTRG.18.tt
			hidden_effect = {
				activate_mission = GNG_PTRG_deadline
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Colombia
					check_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 3 }
				}
				clr_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Select_GUI_1_choices_Visible
				GNG_setup_SPART_missions = yes
				set_variable = { PTRG_spart_corp_num = 3 }
				set_country_flag = GNG_Sony_SPART
				set_global_flag = GNG_Sony_SPART_Global
				set_country_flag = may_send_volunteers
				set_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_deccat_visible
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "No Step Back"
					}
					set_technology = {
						NSB_experimental_SPART_chassis_0 = 1
						NSB_experimental_SPART_modules_sony = 1
					}
					create_equipment_variant = {
						name = "Type 32 Experimental Artillery - Sony Modification"
						type = experimental_SPART_chassis_0
						parent_version = 0
						modules = {
							main_armament_slot = MBT_heavy_artillery_2
							turret_type_slot = MBT_three_man_tank_turret
							suspension_type_slot = tank_torsion_bar_suspension
							armor_type_slot = tank_welded_armor
							engine_type_slot = tank_gasoline_engine
							special_type_slot_1 = smoke_launchers
							special_type_slot_2 = tank_radio_1
							special_type_slot_3 = experimental_auto_loader
						}
						icon = GFX_GNG_SPART_experimental_sony_medium
						upgrades = {
							tank_nsb_engine_upgrade = 5
							tank_nsb_armor_upgrade = 5
						}
					}
					GNG = {
						add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
							type = experimental_SPART_chassis_0
							amount = 20
							producer = GNG
							variant_name = "Type 32 Experimental Artillery - Sony Modification"
						}
					}
				}
				else = {
					set_technology = {
						experimental_SPART_equipment_0 = 1
					}
					create_equipment_variant = {
						name = "Type 32 Experimental Artillery - Sony Modification"
						type = experimental_SPART_equipment_0
						icon = GFX_GNG_SPART_experimental_sony_medium
						upgrades = {
							tank_art_upgrade = 1
							tank_engine_upgrade = 1
						}
					}
					GNG = {
						add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
							type = experimental_SPART_equipment_0
							amount = 20
							producer = GNG
							variant_name = "Type 32 Experimental Artillery - Sony Modification"
						}
					}
				}
				set_temp_variable = { target = CLC }
				TNO_increase_volunteer_cap_1 = yes
				load_oob = "GNG_Research_SPART"
				country_event = {
					id = GNG_PTRG.16
					days = 10
				}
				country_event = {
					id = GNG_PTRG.22
					days = 25
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Colombia
					check_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 4 }
				}
				clr_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Select_GUI_1_choices_Visible
				GNG_setup_SPART_missions = yes
				set_variable = { PTRG_spart_corp_num = 4 }
				set_country_flag = GNG_Matsushita_SPART
				set_global_flag = GNG_Matsushita_SPART_Global
				set_country_flag = may_send_volunteers
				set_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_deccat_visible
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "No Step Back"
					}
					set_technology = {
						NSB_experimental_SPART_chassis_0 = 1
						NSB_experimental_SPART_modules_matsushita = 1
					}
					create_equipment_variant = {
						name = "Type 32 Experimental Artillery - Matsushita Modification"
						type = experimental_SPART_chassis_0
						parent_version = 0
						modules = {
							main_armament_slot = MBT_heavy_artillery_2
							turret_type_slot = MBT_three_man_tank_turret
							suspension_type_slot = experimental_wheel_suspension
							armor_type_slot = tank_welded_armor
							engine_type_slot = tank_gasoline_engine
							special_type_slot_1 = smoke_launchers
							special_type_slot_2 = tank_radio_1
						}
						icon = GFX_GNG_SPART_experimental_matsushita_medium
						upgrades = {
							tank_nsb_engine_upgrade = 5
							tank_nsb_armor_upgrade = 5
						}
					}
					GNG = {
						add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
							type = experimental_SPART_chassis_0
							amount = 20
							producer = GNG
							variant_name = "Type 32 Experimental Artillery - Matsushita Modification"
						}
					}
				}
				else = {
					set_technology = {
						experimental_SPART_equipment_0 = 1
					}
					create_equipment_variant = {
						name = "Type 32 Experimental Artillery - Matsushita Modification"
						type = experimental_SPART_equipment_0
						icon = GFX_GNG_SPART_experimental_matsushita_medium
						upgrades = {

						}
					}
					GNG = {

							type = experimental_SPART_equipment_0
							amount = 20

				TNO_increase_volunteer_cap_1 = yes

				country_event = {
					id = GNG_PTRG.16
					days = 10
				}
				country_event = {
					id = GNG_PTRG.23
					days = 25
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Colombia
					check_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 5 }
				}
				clr_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Select_GUI_1_choices_Visible
				GNG_setup_SPART_missions = yes
				set_variable = { PTRG_spart_corp_num = 5 }

country_event = { #
	id = GNG_PTRG.19
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_PTRG.19" }
	title = GNG_PTRG.19.t
	desc = GNG_PTRG.19.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_INS_cw_1
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_global_flag = YUN_NPA_GAW_Crisis }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Colombia }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = GNG_PTRG.19.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				GNG = {
					is_ai = no
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.15 }
			econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
			set_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Select_GUI_2_choices_Visible
			set_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Indonesia
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_PTRG.19.tt
			hidden_effect = {
				activate_mission = GNG_PTRG_deadline
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.15 }
			econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
			set_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Indonesia
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_PTRG.19.tt
			hidden_effect = {
				activate_mission = GNG_PTRG_deadline
			}
			random_list = {
				80 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = GNG_HITACHI_COUP
							option = GNG_HITACHI_COUP_YES
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Indonesia
						}
						custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_subsidize_hitachi_indonesia_PTRG
						set_temp_variable = { money_reserves_temp = 0.35 }
						econ_money_reserves_change_raw_money = yes
						set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 5 }
						GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
						hidden_effect = {
							clr_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Select_GUI_2_choices_Visible
							GNG_setup_tank_missions = yes
							set_variable = { PTRG_tank_corp_num = 7 }
							set_country_flag = GNG_Hitachi_Tank
							set_global_flag = GNG_Hitachi_Tank_Global
							set_country_flag = may_send_volunteers
							set_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_deccat_visible
							set_temp_variable = { target = INS }
							set_temp_variable = { number = 1 }
							TNO_set_num_volunteers = yes
							set_temp_variable = { alert_id = token:Alert_GNG_PTRG }
							add_TNO_alert_unless_exists = yes
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_dlc = "No Step Back"
								}
								set_technology = {
									NSB_experimental_MBT_chassis_0 = 1
									NSB_experimental_MBT_modules_hitachi = 1
								}
								create_equipment_variant = {
									name = "Type 30 Hitachi Experimental Battle Tank"
									type = experimental_MBT_chassis_0
									parent_version = 0
									modules = {
										main_armament_slot = MBT_cannon_3
										turret_type_slot = MBT_three_man_tank_turret
										suspension_type_slot = experimental_screw_suspension
										armor_type_slot = tank_welded_armor
										engine_type_slot = tank_gasoline_engine
										special_type_slot_1 = smoke_launchers
										special_type_slot_2 = tank_radio_1
									}
									icon = GFX_GNG_MBT_experimental_hitachi_medium
									upgrades = {
										tank_nsb_engine_upgrade = 5
										tank_nsb_armor_upgrade = 5
									}
								}
								GNG = {
									add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
										type = experimental_MBT_chassis_0
										amount = 20
										producer = GNG
										variant_name = "Type 30 Hitachi Experimental Battle Tank"
									}
								}
							}
							else = {
								set_technology = {
									experimental_MBT_equipment_0 = 1
								}
								create_equipment_variant = {
									name = "Type 30 Hitachi Experimental Battle Tank"
									type = experimental_MBT_equipment_0
									icon = GFX_GNG_MBT_experimental_hitachi_medium
									upgrades = {
										tank_gun_upgrade = 1
										tank_armor_upgrade = 1
									}
								}
								GNG = {
									add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
										type = experimental_MBT_equipment_0
										amount = 20
										producer = GNG
										variant_name = "Type 30 Hitachi Experimental Battle Tank"
									}
								}
							}
							load_oob = "GNG_Research_Tank"
							country_event = {
								id = GNG_PTRG.15
								days = 10
							}
							country_event = {
								id = GNG_PTRG.29
								days = 25
							}
						}
					}
				}
				20 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = GNG_HITACHI_COUP
							option = GNG_HITACHI_COUP_NO
						}
					}
					custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_subsidize_hitachi_indonesia_PTRG
					set_temp_variable = { money_reserves_temp = 0.35 }
					econ_money_reserves_change_raw_money = yes
					set_temp_variable = { GNG_corruption_temp_var = 5 }
					GNG_Corruption_Change = yes
					hidden_effect = {
						clr_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Select_GUI_2_choices_Visible
						GNG_setup_tank_missions = yes
						set_variable = { PTRG_tank_corp_num = 7 }
						set_country_flag = GNG_Hitachi_Tank
						set_global_flag = GNG_Hitachi_Tank_Global
						set_country_flag = may_send_volunteers
						set_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_deccat_visible
						set_temp_variable = { target = INS }
						set_temp_variable = { number = 1 }
						TNO_set_num_volunteers = yes
						set_temp_variable = { alert_id = token:Alert_GNG_PTRG }
						add_TNO_alert_unless_exists = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_dlc = "No Step Back"
							}
							set_technology = {
								NSB_experimental_MBT_chassis_0 = 1
								NSB_experimental_MBT_modules_hitachi = 1
							}
							create_equipment_variant = {
								name = "Type 30 Hitachi Experimental Battle Tank"
								type = experimental_MBT_chassis_0
								parent_version = 0
								modules = {
									main_armament_slot = MBT_cannon_3
									turret_type_slot = MBT_three_man_tank_turret
									suspension_type_slot = experimental_screw_suspension
									armor_type_slot = tank_welded_armor
									engine_type_slot = tank_gasoline_engine
									special_type_slot_1 = smoke_launchers
									special_type_slot_2 = tank_radio_1
								}
								icon = GFX_GNG_MBT_experimental_hitachi_medium
								upgrades = {
									tank_nsb_engine_upgrade = 5
									tank_nsb_armor_upgrade = 5
								}
							}
							GNG = {
								add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
									type = experimental_MBT_chassis_0
									amount = 20
									producer = GNG
									variant_name = "Type 30 Hitachi Experimental Battle Tank"
								}
							}
						}
						else = {
							set_technology = {
								experimental_MBT_equipment_0 = 1
							}
							create_equipment_variant = {
								name = "Type 30 Hitachi Experimental Battle Tank"
								type = experimental_MBT_equipment_0
								icon = GFX_GNG_MBT_experimental_hitachi_medium
								upgrades = {
									tank_gun_upgrade = 1
									tank_armor_upgrade = 1
								}
							}
							GNG = {
								add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
									type = experimental_MBT_equipment_0
									amount = 20
									producer = GNG
									variant_name = "Type 30 Hitachi Experimental Battle Tank"
								}
							}
						}
						load_oob = "GNG_Research_Tank"
						country_event = {
							id = GNG_PTRG.15
							days = 10
						}
						country_event = {
							id = GNG_PTRG.29
							days = 25
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = GNG_PTRG.20
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_PTRG.20" }
	title = GNG_PTRG.20.t
	desc = GNG_PTRG.20.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_OC_War
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_global_flag = YUN_NPA_GAW_Crisis }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = GNG_PTRG.20.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				GNG = {
					is_ai = no
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.20 }
			econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
			set_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Select_GUI_1_choices_Visible
			set_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_OC
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_PTRG.20.tt
			hidden_effect = {
				activate_mission = GNG_PTRG_deadline
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.20 }
			econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
			set_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_OC
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_PTRG.20.tt
			hidden_effect = {
				activate_mission = GNG_PTRG_deadline
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_OC
					check_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_in_power = 3 }
				}
				set_technology = {
					experimental_helicopter_equipment_sony_0 = 1
				}
				clr_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Select_GUI_1_choices_Visible
				load_oob = "GNG_Research_Helicopters"
				GNG_setup_helicopter_missions = yes

					id = GNG_PTRG.17

					days = 25

country_event = { #
	id = GNG_PTRG.21
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_PTRG.21" }
	title = GNG_PTRG.21.t
	desc = GNG_PTRG.21.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_ptrg_report

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = GNG_PTRG.21.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_PTRG_Outcome_Preface_tt
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Indonesia_Holding }
			clr_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Indonesia_Holding
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_INS_Success_Counter < 2 }
				}
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = -2 }
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = PTRG_tank_corp_num }
				GNG_change_legco_seats = yes

				set_temp_variable = { money_reserves_temp = 0.04 }
				econ_money_reserves_change_raw_money = yes
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_global_flag = GNG_Sony_Tank_Global
					}
					CHI = {
						country_event = GNG_PTRG.35
					}
				}
				JAP = {
					country_event = GNG_PTRG.34
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_INS_Success_Counter = 2 }
				}
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = -1 }
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = PTRG_tank_corp_num }
				GNG_change_legco_seats = yes

				set_temp_variable = { money_reserves_temp = 0.07 }
				econ_money_reserves_change_raw_money = yes
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							has_global_flag = GNG_Sony_Tank_Global
						}
					}
					set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = 1.5 }
					GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
				}
				else = {
					set_temp_variable = { GNG_opinion_temp_var = 1 }
					GNG_China_opinion_change = yes
					set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = 1 }
					GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
					CHI = {
						country_event = GNG_PTRG.35
					}
				}

				JAP = {
					country_event = GNG_PTRG.34
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_INS_Success_Counter = 3 }
				}
				set_temp_variable = { money_reserves_temp = 0.10 }
				econ_money_reserves_change_raw_money = yes
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							has_global_flag = GNG_Sony_Tank_Global
						}
					}
					set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = 3 }
					GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
				}
				else = {
					set_temp_variable = { GNG_opinion_temp_var = 2 }
					GNG_China_opinion_change = yes
					set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = 2 }
					GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
					CHI = {
						country_event = GNG_PTRG.35
					}
				}

				JAP = {
					country_event = GNG_PTRG.34
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_INS_Success_Counter = 4 }
				}
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = 1 }
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = PTRG_tank_corp_num }
				GNG_change_legco_seats = yes

				set_temp_variable = { money_reserves_temp = 0.16 }
				econ_money_reserves_change_raw_money = yes
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							has_global_flag = GNG_Sony_Tank_Global
						}
					}
					set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = 4.5 }
					GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
				}
				else = {
					set_temp_variable = { GNG_opinion_temp_var = 3 }
					GNG_China_opinion_change = yes
					set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = 3 }
					GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
					CHI = {
						country_event = GNG_PTRG.35
					}
				}

				JAP = {
					country_event = GNG_PTRG.34
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_INS_Success_Counter = 5 }
				}
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = 2 }
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = PTRG_tank_corp_num }
				GNG_change_legco_seats = yes

				econ_money_reserves_change_raw_money = yes

					country_event = GNG_PTRG.38
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_OC_Success_Counter = 4 }
				}
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = 1 }
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = PTRG_helicopter_corp_num }
				GNG_change_legco_seats = yes

				set_temp_variable = { money_reserves_temp = 0.16 }
				econ_money_reserves_change_raw_money = yes
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							has_global_flag = GNG_Sony_Helicopter_Global
						}
					}
					set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = 4.5 }
					GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
				}
				else = {
					set_temp_variable = { GNG_opinion_temp_var = 3 }
					GNG_China_opinion_change = yes
					set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = 3 }
					GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
					CHI = {
						country_event = GNG_PTRG.39
					}
				}

				JAP = {
					country_event = GNG_PTRG.38
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_OC_Success_Counter = 5 }
				}
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = 2 }
				set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = PTRG_helicopter_corp_num }
				GNG_change_legco_seats = yes

				set_temp_variable = { money_reserves_temp = 0.22 }
				econ_money_reserves_change_raw_money = yes
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							has_global_flag = GNG_Sony_Helicopter_Global
						}
					}
					set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = 6 }
					GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
				}
				else = {
					set_temp_variable = { GNG_opinion_temp_var = 4 }
					GNG_China_opinion_change = yes
					set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = 4 }
					GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
					CHI = {
						country_event = GNG_PTRG.39
					}
				}

				JAP = {
					country_event = GNG_PTRG.38
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = GNG_ptrg_profits_dummy
					days = 120
				}
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = GNG_PTRG_profits
					days = 120
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_ptrg_idea
			hidden_effect = {
				GNG_JAP_CHI_Helicopter_Add = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #assorted debug
	id = GNG_PTRG.1000
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_PTRG.1000" }
	title = GNG_PTRG.1000.t
	desc = GNG_PTRG.1000.desc

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = GNG_PTRG.1000.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			INS_ICW_spawn_all_tags = yes
			INS_ICW_declare_war = yes
		}
		set_technology = {
			NSB_experimental_MBT_chassis_0 = 1
			NSB_experimental_MBT_modules_sony = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "No Step Back"
			}
			create_equipment_variant = {
				name = "Type 29 Sony Experimental Battle Tank"
				type = experimental_MBT_chassis_0
				parent_version = 0
				modules = {
					main_armament_slot = MBT_cannon_3
					turret_type_slot = MBT_three_man_tank_turret
					suspension_type_slot = tank_torsion_bar_suspension
					armor_type_slot = tank_welded_armor
					engine_type_slot = tank_gasoline_engine
					special_type_slot_1 = smoke_launchers
					special_type_slot_2 = tank_radio_1
					special_type_slot_3 = experimental_night_vision
				}
				icon = GFX_GNG_MBT_experimental_sony_medium
				upgrades = {
					tank_nsb_engine_upgrade = 5
					tank_nsb_armor_upgrade = 5
				}
			}
		}
		load_oob = "GNG_Research_Tank"
		GNG_setup_tank_missions = yes
		set_country_flag = may_send_volunteers
		set_temp_variable = { target = INS }
		set_temp_variable = { number = 1 }
		TNO_set_num_volunteers = yes
		set_temp_variable = { alert_id = token:Alert_GNG_PTRG }
		add_TNO_alert_unless_exists = yes
	}
}

# PTRG Flavour Events

	id = GNG_PTRG_flavour.1
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_PTRG_flavour.1"
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = GNG_PTRG.1
				days = 20
			}
		}
	}
	title = GNG_PTRG_flavour.1.t
	desc = GNG_PTRG_flavour.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_PHI_IJA_soldiers_jungle

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = GNG_PTRG_flavour.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_PTRG_flavour.1.tt
	}
}

# GNG_econ_mechanic

country_event = { # Economy Check Alert
	id = GNG_Econ.0
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_Econ.0"
	}
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_disable_all_mechanics_IJA }
	}
	hidden = yes
	title = GNG_Econ.0.t
	desc = GNG_Econ.0.desc

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = GNG_Econ.0.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { alert_id = token:Alert_GNG_Economy_Check_Soon }
		add_TNO_alert_unless_exists = yes
	}
}

country_event = { # Yearly Pulse that checks if you hit the GDP goal or not
	id = GNG_Econ.1
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_Econ.1"
	}
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_disable_all_mechanics_IJA }
	}
	hidden = yes
	title = GNG_Econ.1.t
	desc = GNG_Econ.1.desc

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = GNG_Econ.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		GNG_target_gdp_check = yes
		country_event = { #Pulse that will start the Product Cycle in late May every year
			id = GNG_Product_Cycle.1
			days = 100
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #1963 Success Event
	id = GNG_Econ.2
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_Econ.2"

			country_event = { #Yearly Pulse
				id = GNG_Econ.1
				days = 365
			}
		}

country_event = { # Failure
	id = GNG_Econ.6
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_Econ.6"
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { #Alert
				id = GNG_Econ.0
				days = 305
			}
			country_event = { #Yearly Pulse
				id = GNG_Econ.1
				days = 365
			}
		}
	}
	title = GNG_Econ.6.t
	desc = GNG_Econ.6.desc

	}

country_event = { #
	id = GNG_Western_Insurrection.8
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_Western_Insurrection.8" }
	title = GNG_Western_Insurrection.8.t
	desc = GNG_Western_Insurrection.8.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_YUN_Chinese_Troops_Victory

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = GNG_Western_Insurrection.8.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				GNG = {
					has_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Indonesia
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				GNG_PTRG_Indonesia_END = yes
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_Forced_Pullout_PTRG_tt
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				GNG = {
					has_country_flag = GNG_PTRG_Colombia
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				GNG_PTRG_Colombia_END = yes
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_Forced_Pullout_PTRG_tt
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_WI_PTRG_unit_tt
		set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.075 }
		econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
		country_event = { id = GNG_Western_Insurrection.9 days = 5 }
		hidden_effect = {
			load_oob = "GNG_Research_Rifles"
			GNG = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = GNG_Fujitsu_Rifle_Global }
					add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
						type = experimental_infantry_equipment_fujitsu_1
						amount = 400
						producer = GNG
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = GNG_Matsushita_Rifle_Global }
					add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
						type = experimental_infantry_equipment_matsushita_1
						amount = 400
						producer = GNG
					}
				}
				else = {
					add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
						type = experimental_infantry_equipment_sony_1
						amount = 400
						producer = GNG
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# China Opinion Events 3 Evils

country_event = { #SONG EVENT 1
	id = GNG_ChinaOpinion.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_ChinaOpinion.1" }

	desc = GNG_ChinaOpinion.1.desc
	title = GNG_ChinaOpinion.1.t
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_generic_post_office_1
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_variable = { times_visited_song = 1 }
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						times_visited_song = 2
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = GNG_ChinaOpinion.7
					days = 7
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						times_visited_song = 4
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = GNG_ChinaOpinion.8
					days = 7
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						times_visited_song = 6
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = GNG_ChinaOpinion.9
					days = 7
				}
			}
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { # Good answer
		name = GNG_ChinaOpinion.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 0.5 }
		set_temp_variable = {
			GNG_opinion_temp_var = 3
		}
		GNG_China_opinion_change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = -1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = GNG_legco_faction_in_power }
		GNG_change_legco_seats = yes

	}
	option = { # Bad answer
		name = GNG_ChinaOpinion.1.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 0.5 }
	}
}

		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_variable = { times_visited_wang = 1 }
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						times_visited_wang = 2
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = GNG_ChinaOpinion.16
					days = 7
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						times_visited_wang = 4
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = GNG_ChinaOpinion.17
					days = 7
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						times_visited_wang = 6
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = GNG_ChinaOpinion.18
					days = 7
				}
			}
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = GNG_ChinaOpinion.10.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = {
			GNG_opinion_temp_var = -3
		}
		GNG_China_opinion_change = yes
	}
}

# Japan Approval Events 3 Evils

# TAKASHIMA

country_event = { #Takashima 1
	id = GNG_JapanApproval.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_JapanApproval.1" }

	title = GNG_JapanApproval.1.t
	desc = GNG_JapanApproval.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_Japanese_party_1
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_variable = { takashima_times_met = 1 }
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						takashima_times_met = 2
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = GNG_JapanApproval.7 days = 7 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						takashima_times_met = 4
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = GNG_JapanApproval.8 days = 7 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						takashima_times_met = 6
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = GNG_JapanApproval.9 days = 7 }
			}
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { # Let the matter drop
		name = GNG_JapanApproval.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 0.5 }
		set_temp_variable = {
			GNG_approval_temp_var = 3
		}
		GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
		random_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = -1 }
			GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
		}
	}
	option = { # Choose to press ahead anyway
		name = GNG_JapanApproval.1.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 0.5 }
		random_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { jap_app_temp = -1.5 }
			GNG_japanese_app_change = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Takashima 2
	id = GNG_JapanApproval.2
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_JapanApproval.2" }
	title = GNG_JapanApproval.2.t
	desc = GNG_JapanApproval.2.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_Japanese_party_2
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_variable = { takashima_times_met = 1 }
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						takashima_times_met = 2
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = GNG_JapanApproval.7 days = 7 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						takashima_times_met = 4
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = GNG_JapanApproval.8 days = 7 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						takashima_times_met = 6
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = GNG_JapanApproval.9 days = 7 }
			}
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Accept
		name = GNG_JapanApproval.2.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 0.5 }
		set_temp_variable = {
			GNG_approval_temp_var = 4
		}
		GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = -1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = GNG_legco_faction_in_power }
		GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
	}

	option = { #Decide not to put exposition on hold (no change)
		name = GNG_JapanApproval.2.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 0.5 }

	}
}

country_event = { #TAKASHIMA 3
	id = GNG_JapanApproval.3
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_JapanApproval.3" }
	title = GNG_JapanApproval.3.t
	desc = GNG_JapanApproval.3.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_Japanese_party_3
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_variable = { takashima_times_met = 1 }
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						takashima_times_met = 2
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = GNG_JapanApproval.7 days = 7 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						takashima_times_met = 4
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = GNG_JapanApproval.8 days = 7 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						takashima_times_met = 6
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = GNG_JapanApproval.9 days = 7 }
			}
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Accept
		name = GNG_JapanApproval.3.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 0.5 }
		set_temp_variable = {
			GNG_approval_temp_var = 4
		}
		GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_product_profitability_temp_var = -0.10 }
		GNG_product_cycle_profitability_change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { money_reserves_temp = 0.125 }
		econ_money_reserves_change_raw_money = yes
	}

	option = { #tell japan to DROP IT
		name = GNG_JapanApproval.3.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 0.5 }
		set_temp_variable = {
			GNG_approval_temp_var = -1
		}
		GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Takashima 5
	id = GNG_JapanApproval.5
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_JapanApproval.5" }
	title = GNG_JapanApproval.5.t
	desc = GNG_JapanApproval.5.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_Japanese_party_5
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_variable = { takashima_times_met = 1 }
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						takashima_times_met = 2
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = GNG_JapanApproval.7 days = 7 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						takashima_times_met = 4
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = GNG_JapanApproval.8 days = 7 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						takashima_times_met = 6
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = GNG_JapanApproval.9 days = 7 }
			}
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Agree
		name = GNG_JapanApproval.5.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = {
			GNG_approval_temp_var = 4
		}
		GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.15
		}
		econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
		random_owned_state = {
			limit = { NOT = { GNG_is_pearl_river_delta_state = yes } }
			set_temp_variable = { sar_spt_temp = -1.25 }
			GNG_police_control_change = yes
		}
		random_owned_state = {
			limit = { NOT = { GNG_is_pearl_river_delta_state = yes } }
			set_temp_variable = { sar_spt_temp = -1.25 }
			GNG_police_control_change = yes
		}
		random_owned_state = {
			limit = { NOT = { GNG_is_pearl_river_delta_state = yes } }
			set_temp_variable = { sar_spt_temp = -1.25 }
			GNG_police_control_change = yes
		}
	}

	option = { #No
		name = GNG_JapanApproval.5.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }

	}
}

country_event = { #Takashima special - met takashima twice
	id = GNG_JapanApproval.7
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_JapanApproval.7" }
	title = GNG_JapanApproval.7.t
	desc = GNG_JapanApproval.7.desc

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = GNG_JapanApproval.7.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { GNG_takashima_special_chances = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_one_more_jap_riots_decision_tt
	}
}

country_event = { #Takashima special - met takashima fource
	id = GNG_JapanApproval.8
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event GNG_JapanApproval.8" }
	title = GNG_JapanApproval.8.t
	desc = GNG_JapanApproval.8.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_Takashima_Masuo_3

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #humor him for a bit
		name = GNG_JapanApproval.8.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 0.5 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_seat_temp = -1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_legco_faction_temp = GNG_legco_faction_in_power }
		GNG_change_legco_seats = yes
		add_to_variable = { GNG_takashima_special_chances = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_one_more_jap_riots_decision_tt
	}

	option = { #no
		name = GNG_JapanApproval.8.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 0.5 }
		add_political_power = 25
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_tell_the_consul_no_tt
	}
}

country_event = { #GFT Chain Generic Failure
	id = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.1
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			GNG_fail_GFT_dismantlement = yes
		}
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.1"
	}

	title = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.1.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_generic_riots_14

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.1.a
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Strength_Temp = 10 }
		GNG_Riots_GFT_Strength_Change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_Despair_Temp = 5 }
		GNG_Despair_Change = yes
		GNG_fail_GFT_dismantlement = no
	}
}

			}

				hours = 60
			}

		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_GFT_Spilt_Them_Up_FLAG
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0.5 }

		hidden_effect = {

				hours = 60

				id = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.1
				hours = 60
			}
		}

		clr_country_flag = GNG_GFT_Spilt_Them_Up_FLAG
	}

country_event = { #NUMBER 15 LETS GOOOOOOOOO
	id = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.15
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.15" }

	title = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.15.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.15.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_generic_riots_16
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = GNG_Dismantlement_GFT_Happening
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.15.a
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { GFT_investigation_clue > 0.99 } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = GFT_dismantlement_phase_1_two_clues_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.50
					hours = 60
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_to_variable = { GFT_investigation_clue = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = GFT_dismantlement_phase_1_one_clue_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {

	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.17.a
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { GFT_investigation_clue > 0.99 } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = GFT_dismantlement_phase_1_two_clues_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.50
					hours = 60
				}
			}
		}
		else = {

			custom_effect_tooltip = GFT_dismantlement_phase_1_one_clue_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.10
					hours = 60
				}
			}
		}

		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_amount_of_correct_choices_dismantlement_tt

			if = {

					hours = 60
				}

			else_if = {

					hours = 60
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_GFT_SpiltPath_Variable_Correct_Choice = 0 }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.30
					hours = 60
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_dismantlement_less_than_20_pp

		}

		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Japan_Riots = 15 }
		GNG_Japanese_Intervention_change = yes
		add_political_power = -20
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.28
				hours = 60
			}
		}

country_event = { # new path 45
	id = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.45
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.45" }

	title = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.45.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.45.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_generic_HK_police_3
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = GNG_Dismantlement_GFT_Happening
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.45.a
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { GFT_investigation_clue > 0.99 } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = GFT_dismantlement_phase_1_two_clues_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.50
					hours = 60
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_to_variable = { GFT_investigation_clue = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = GFT_dismantlement_phase_1_one_clue_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.10
					hours = 60
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = GNG_GFT_Spilt_Them_Up_FLAG
	}
}

	id = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.52

	desc = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.52.desc
