	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = GNG_Dismantlement_GFT_Happening
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.52.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_GFT_radicalism_dismantlement_high_good_tt
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { GNG_Japan_Riots > 60 } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_dismantlement_intervention_above_60_action_tt
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism < 75 }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.53
					hours = 60
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism > 75 }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.54
					hours = 60
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.52.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { check_variable = { GNG_Japan_Riots > 60 } }
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_GFT_radicalism_dismantlement_low_good_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism < 75 }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.56
					hours = 60
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism > 75 }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.55
					hours = 60
				}
			}
		}
	}

		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_success_point_GFT_low
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.57
				hours = 60
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # new path 58
	id = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.58
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.58" }

	title = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.58.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.58.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_guangzhou_4
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = GNG_Dismantlement_GFT_Happening
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.58.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism > 69.99 }
					check_variable = { GNG_Destroy_GFT_Success_Points > 2.9 }
				}
				AND = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism > 69.99 }
					check_variable = { GNG_majority_controller = 6 }
					check_variable = { GNG_Destroy_GFT_Success_Points > 2.4 }
				}
				AND = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism < 70 }
					check_variable = { GNG_Destroy_GFT_Success_Points > 2.4 }
				}
				AND = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism < 70 }
					check_variable = { GNG_Destroy_GFT_Success_Points > 1.9 }
					check_variable = { GNG_majority_controller = 6 }
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.59
				hours = 60
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.58.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism > 69.99 }
					check_variable = { GNG_Destroy_GFT_Success_Points < 3 }
				}
				AND = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism > 69.99 }
					check_variable = { GNG_majority_controller = 6 }
					check_variable = { GNG_Destroy_GFT_Success_Points < 2.5 }
				}
				AND = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism < 70 }
					check_variable = { GNG_Destroy_GFT_Success_Points < 2.5 }
				}
				AND = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism < 70 }
					check_variable = { GNG_Destroy_GFT_Success_Points < 2 }
					check_variable = { GNG_majority_controller = 6 }
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.61
				hours = 60
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # new path 59
	id = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.59
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.59" }

	title = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.59.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.59.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_generic_HK_police_3
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = GNG_Dismantlement_GFT_Happening
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.59.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism < 70 }
				check_variable = { GNG_Destroy_GFT_Success_Points > 2.4 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_GFT_dismantlement_under_70_radicalism_success_tt
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism < 70 }
				check_variable = { GNG_Destroy_GFT_Success_Points > 1.9 }
				check_variable = { GNG_majority_controller = 6 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_GFT_dismantlement_under_70_radicalism_success_govt_control_tt
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism > 69.99 }
				check_variable = { GNG_majority_controller = 6 }
				check_variable = { GNG_Destroy_GFT_Success_Points < 2.5 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_GFT_dismantlement_above_70_radicalism_success_govt_control_tt
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism > 69.99 }
				check_variable = { GNG_Destroy_GFT_Success_Points > 2.4 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_GFT_dismantlement_above_70_radicalism_success_tt
		}
		GNG_GFT_dismantle = yes
	}
}

country_event = { # new path 61
	id = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.61
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.61" }

	title = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.61.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.61.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_commonOC.1
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = GNG_Dismantlement_GFT_Happening
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_RiotsGFTdismantlement.61.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism < 70 }
				check_variable = { GNG_Destroy_GFT_Success_Points > 1.5 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_GFT_dismantlement_under_70_radicalism_1_5_points_failure_tt
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism < 70 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_GFT_dismantlement_under_70_radicalism_success_govt_control_tt
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism > 69.99 }
				check_variable = { GNG_Destroy_GFT_Success_Points > 2 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_GFT_dismantlement_above_70_radicalism_2_points_failure_tt
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Radicalism > 69.99 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_GFT_dismantlement_above_70_radicalism_failure_tt
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_GFT_Strength_Temp = 7 }
		GNG_Riots_GFT_Strength_Change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_Despair_Temp = 5 }
		GNG_Despair_Change = yes
		GNG_fail_GFT_dismantlement = yes
	}
}

# CCL Event Chain #

country_event = { #CCL Chain Generic Failure
	id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.1
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			GNG_fail_CCL_dismantlement = yes
		}
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.1"
	}

	title = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.1.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_generic_factory_1

	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = GNG_Dismantlement_CCL_Happening
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 0.5 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_CCL_Strength_Temp = 10 }
		GNG_Riots_CCL_Strength_Change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_Despair_Temp = 5 }
		GNG_Despair_Change = yes
		GNG_fail_CCL_dismantlement = no
	}
}

country_event = { #CCL Chain part 1
	id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.2
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.2" }

	title = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.2.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.2.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_generic_tokyo_police_3

	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = GNG_Dismantlement_CCL_Happening
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.2.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_CCL_Street_Protest_Rollup_flag
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0.5 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement_2_a_tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.3 #Street Protest
				hours = 60
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.2.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_CCL_Investigate_Organizations_flag
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0.5 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement_2_b_tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.20 #Investigate Organizations
				hours = 60
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #Failed
		name = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.2.c
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = GNG_CCL_Street_Protest_Rollup_flag
			has_country_flag = GNG_CCL_Investigate_Organizations_flag
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.1
				hours = 60
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = CCL_dismantlement_2_c_tt
		clr_country_flag = GNG_CCL_Investigate_Organizations_flag
		clr_country_flag = GNG_CCL_Street_Protest_Rollup_flag
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.7
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.7" }
	title = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.7.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.7.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_generic_HK_police_5

	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = GNG_Dismantlement_CCL_Happening
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.7.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { CCL_investigation_clue > 1.99 } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = CCL_enough_clues_due_to_prior_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.47
					hours = 60
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { CCL_investigation_clue > 0.99 }
				check_variable = { GNG_majority_controller = 6 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = CCL_enough_clues_due_to_prior_underworld_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.47
					hours = 60
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { CCL_investigation_clue < 2 } }
			add_to_variable = { CCL_investigation_clue = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = CCL_investigation_clue_1
			custom_effect_tooltip = CCL_dismantlement_phase_1_revise_options
			set_country_flag = GNG_CCL_Street_Protest_Rollup_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.2
					hours = 60
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

			}

			hidden_effect = {

				}

					hours = 60
				}
			}
		}

		GNG_Despair_Change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Japan_Riots_Temp = 5 }
		GNG_Japanese_Intervention_Change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_CCL_Strength_Temp = 3 }
		GNG_Riots_CCL_Strength_Change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_CCL_Radicalism_Temp = 3 }
		GNG_Riots_CCL_Radicalism_Change = yes

		GNG_Japanese_Intervention_Change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_Despair_Tick_Temp = 3 }
		GNG_Riots_Despair_Tick_Change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_CCL_Strength_Temp = 3 }
		GNG_Riots_CCL_Strength_Change = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.16
				hours = 60
			}
		}
	}

				has_country_flag = GNG_CCL_investigated_chinese_consulate_general
			}

		custom_effect_tooltip = CCL_dismantlement_chinese_consulate_general_once

					hours = 60
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.38
					hours = 60
				}
			}
		}
	}

					hours = 60
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { GNG_Riots_CCL_Radicalism > 35 }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.30
					hours = 60
				}

		}
	}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.29
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.29" }
	title = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.29.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.29.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_fujitsu_type_4_telephone

	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = GNG_Dismantlement_CCL_Happening
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.29.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_dismantlement_below_35_CCL_radicalism_success
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_CCL_Strength_Temp = 7 }
		GNG_Riots_CCL_Strength_Change = yes
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { CCL_investigation_clue > 1.99 } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = CCL_enough_clues_due_to_prior_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.47
					hours = 60
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { CCL_investigation_clue > 0.99 }
				check_variable = { GNG_majority_controller = 6 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = CCL_enough_clues_due_to_prior_underworld_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.47
					hours = 60
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { CCL_investigation_clue < 2 } }
			add_to_variable = { CCL_investigation_clue = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = CCL_investigation_clue_1
			custom_effect_tooltip = CCL_dismantlement_phase_1_revise_options
			set_country_flag = GNG_CCL_Investigate_Organizations_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.2
					hours = 60
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #

	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.32" }

	desc = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.32.desc

	}

		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }

			limit = { has_country_flag = CCL_dismantlement_36_special_flag }
			clr_country_flag = CCL_dismantlement_36_special_flag
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_dismantlement_above_60_CCL_radicalism_failed
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { CCL_investigation_clue > 1.99 } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = CCL_enough_clues_due_to_prior_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.47
					hours = 60
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { CCL_investigation_clue > 0.99 }
				check_variable = { GNG_majority_controller = 6 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = CCL_enough_clues_due_to_prior_underworld_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.47
					hours = 60
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { CCL_investigation_clue < 2 } }
			add_to_variable = { CCL_investigation_clue = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = CCL_investigation_clue_1
			custom_effect_tooltip = CCL_dismantlement_phase_1_revise_options
			set_country_flag = GNG_CCL_Investigate_Organizations_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.2
					hours = 60
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_CCL_radicalism_dismantlement_factor_further_developments_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { GNG_Riots_CCL_Radicalism < 40.01 } }
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.33
					days = 7
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { GNG_Riots_CCL_Radicalism > 40 } }
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.35
					days = 7
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.37
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.37" }
	title = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.37.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.37.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_kenpeitai_generic

	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = GNG_Dismantlement_CCL_Happening
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.37.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = CCL_dismantlement_36_special_flag }
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_dismantlement_below_60_CCL_radicalism_success
			clr_country_flag = CCL_dismantlement_36_special_flag
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_CCL_Strength_Temp = -10 }
		GNG_Riots_CCL_Strength_Change = yes
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { CCL_investigation_clue > 0.99 } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = CCL_enough_clues_due_to_prior_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.47
					hours = 60
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { CCL_investigation_clue < 1 }
				check_variable = { GNG_majority_controller = 6 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = CCL_enough_clues_due_to_underworld_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.47
					hours = 60
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { CCL_investigation_clue < 1 } }
			add_to_variable = { CCL_investigation_clue = 2 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = CCL_investigation_clue_2
			custom_effect_tooltip = CCL_dismantlement_phase_1_revise_options
			set_country_flag = GNG_CCL_Investigate_Organizations_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.2
					hours = 60
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.48" }

	desc = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.48.desc

		has_country_flag = GNG_Dismantlement_CCL_Happening
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.48.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }

			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					GNG_Riots_CCL_Radicalism > 49.99

			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_dismantlement_above_50_CCL_radicalism_less_efficiency

		}

				check_variable = {
					GNG_Riots_CCL_Radicalism < 50
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_dismantlement_below_50_CCL_radicalism_efficiency
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_ccl_success_points_3
			add_to_variable = { CCL_dismantlement_success_points = 3 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.51
				hours = 120
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.54
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.54" }
	title = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.54.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.54.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_HK_little_ginza

	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = GNG_Dismantlement_CCL_Happening
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.54.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_opinion_temp_var = -6 }
		GNG_China_opinion_change = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { chi_app_temp = -3.5 }
			GNG_chinese_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { zhu_app_temp = -3.5 }
			GNG_zhujin_app_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { jap_app_temp = -3.5 }
			GNG_japanese_app_change = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Japan_Riots_Temp = 5 }
		GNG_Japanese_Intervention_Change = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					GNG_Riots_CCL_Radicalism > 49.99
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_dismantlement_above_50_CCL_radicalism_efficiency
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					GNG_Riots_CCL_Radicalism < 50
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_dismantlement_below_50_CCL_radicalism_less_efficiency
			add_to_variable = { CCL_dismantlement_success_points = -1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_ccl_success_points_minus_1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = GNG_China_Consulate_General_Isolated_Intervention
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { CCL_dismantlement_success_points > 1.99 }
					}
					country_event = {
						id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.62
						hours = 72
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { CCL_dismantlement_success_points < 2 }
					}
					country_event = {
						id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.63
						hours = 72
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = GNG_China_Consulate_General_Isolated_No_Intervention
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.60
					hours = 60
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = GNG_Chinese_intervention
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.61
					hours = 60
				}
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { CCL_dismantlement_success_points > 1.99 }
					}
					country_event = {
						id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.62
						hours = 72
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { CCL_dismantlement_success_points < 2 }
					}
					country_event = {
						id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.63
						hours = 72
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.59
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.59" }
	title = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.59.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.59.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_JAP_newspaper

	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = GNG_Dismantlement_CCL_Happening
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.59.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_approval_temp_var = -4 }
		GNG_Japan_approval_change = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { jap_app_temp = -3 }
			GNG_japanese_app_change = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Japan_Riots_Temp = 5 }
		GNG_Japanese_Intervention_Change = yes
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Riots_Despair_Temp = 5 }
		GNG_Despair_Change = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					GNG_Riots_CCL_Radicalism > 49.99
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_dismantlement_above_50_CCL_radicalism_efficiency
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					GNG_Riots_CCL_Radicalism < 50
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_dismantlement_below_50_CCL_radicalism_less_efficiency
			add_to_variable = { CCL_dismantlement_success_points = -1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_ccl_success_points_minus_1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = GNG_China_Consulate_General_Isolated_Intervention
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { CCL_dismantlement_success_points > 1.99 }
					}
					country_event = {
						id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.62
						hours = 72
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { CCL_dismantlement_success_points < 2 }
					}
					country_event = {
						id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.63
						hours = 72
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = GNG_China_Consulate_General_Isolated_No_Intervention
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.60
					hours = 60
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = GNG_Chinese_intervention
				}
				country_event = {
					id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.61
					hours = 60
				}
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { CCL_dismantlement_success_points > 1.99 }
					}
					country_event = {
						id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.62
						hours = 72
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { CCL_dismantlement_success_points < 2 }
					}
					country_event = {
						id = guangdong_RiotsCCLdismantlement.63
						hours = 72
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

			GNG_japanese_app_change = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_Japan_Riots_Temp = 4 }
		GNG_Japanese_Intervention_Change = yes

		GNG_Riots_CCL_Radicalism_Change = yes

country_event = { # opium wars part 1
	id = guangdong_YakuzaTriadHyperwar.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_YakuzaTriadHyperwar.1" }

	title = guangdong_YakuzaTriadHyperwar.1.t
	desc = guangdong_YakuzaTriadHyperwar.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_HK_port_2

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_YakuzaTriadHyperwar.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = guangdong_YakuzaTriadHyperwar.2 days = 180 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # opium wars part 13 : trail runs cold
	id = guangdong_YakuzaTriadHyperwar.13
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_YakuzaTriadHyperwar.13" }

	title = guangdong_YakuzaTriadHyperwar.13.t
	desc = guangdong_YakuzaTriadHyperwar.13.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_generic_HK_police_8

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_YakuzaTriadHyperwar.13.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = guangdong_YakuzaTriadHyperwar.25 days = 7 }
		}
		set_country_flag = GNG_hyperwar_trail_ran_cold
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				GNG_is_pearl_river_delta_state = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { sar_spt_temp = -2 }
			GNG_police_control_change = yes
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				GNG_is_pearl_river_delta_state = no
			}
			set_temp_variable = { sar_spt_temp = -3 }
			GNG_police_control_change = yes
		}
	}
}

## Guangdong Riots - Consulate Investigation

country_event = { # Investigation Possible
	id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.0
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.0" }
	title = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.0.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.0.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_CHI_nanjingmemories

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.0.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_country_flag = GNG_chinese_consulate_general_investigable
		custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_can_investigate_chinese_consulate_general_tt
	}
}

country_event = { # Deliberating Investigation
	id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.1" }
	title = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.1.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_CHI_nanjingmemories

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { # Motives / Comms
		name = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_chinainvestigation_investigated_motives_comms } }
		custom_effect_tooltip = riotschinainvestigation_1_a_tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.2 days = 2 }
		}
		set_country_flag = GNG_chinainvestigation_investigated_motives_comms
	}
	option = { # Material Evidence
		name = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.1.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_chinainvestigation_material_evidence } }
		custom_effect_tooltip = riotschinainvestigation_1_b_tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.12 days = 2 }
		}
		set_country_flag = GNG_chinainvestigation_material_evidence
	}
	option = { # Song and Wang
		name = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.1.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_chinainvestigation_song_wang } }
		custom_effect_tooltip = riotschinainvestigation_1_c_tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.29 days = 2 }
		}
		set_country_flag = GNG_chinainvestigation_song_wang
	}
	option = { # Back Off / Drop It
		name = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.1.d
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = riotschinainvestigation_1_d_tooltip
		country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.76 days = 2 }
	}
}

country_event = { # Deliberating Investigation
	id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.2
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.2" }
	title = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.2.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.2.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_CHI_nanjing2

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { # Nanjing
		name = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.2.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = riotschinainvestigation_2_a_tooltip
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_Chinese_intervention
				OR = {
					has_idea = GNG_kenpeitai_two_tier_local_policing_dummy
					has_idea = GNG_kenpeitai_the_guangdong_network_dummy
					has_idea = GNG_kenpeitai_the_panopticon_dummy
					has_idea = GNG_kenpeitai_the_militarized_state_dummy
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.7 days = 2 }
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_Chinese_intervention
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.3 days = 2 }
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.4 days = 2 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Within Guangdong
		name = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.2.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = riotschinainvestigation_2_b_tooltip
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_Chinese_intervention
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.5 days = 2 }
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.6 days = 2 }
			}
		}
	}
}

		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_majority_controller = 6 }
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.13 days = 2 }
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_majority_controller = 7 }
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.14 days = 2 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Targeted Searches
		name = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.12.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = riotschinainvestigation_12_b_tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.15 days = 2 }
		}
	}
}

	desc = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.13.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_MAN_truck

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Thorough Inspections
		name = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.13.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		trigger = { check_variable = { GNG_Riots_Despair < 65 } }
		custom_effect_tooltip = riotschinainvestigation_13_a_tooltip
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_Chinese_intervention
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.16 days = 4 }
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.17 days = 2 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Quick Inspections
		name = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.13.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { GNG_Riots_Despair > 64.99 } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = GNG_dismantlement_despair_above_65_action_tt
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = riotschinainvestigation_13_b_tooltip
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_Chinese_intervention
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.18 days = 2 }
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.19 days = 2 }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.15
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.15" }
	title = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.15.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.15.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_cigarettes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.15.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = riotschinainvestigation_15_a_tooltip
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_riot_rural_control = 0 }
		add_to_temp_variable = { GNG_riot_rural_control = 593:riot_spt }
		add_to_temp_variable = { GNG_riot_rural_control = 1017:riot_spt }
		add_to_temp_variable = { GNG_riot_rural_control = 1438:riot_spt }
		add_to_temp_variable = { GNG_riot_rural_control = 1439:riot_spt }
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_Chinese_intervention
				check_variable = { GNG_riot_rural_control < 130 }
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.21 days = 2 }
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_riot_rural_control < 130 }
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.22 days = 2 }
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.20 days = 2 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #
		name = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.15.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = riotschinainvestigation_15_b_tooltip
		set_temp_variable = { GNG_pearls_controlled = 0 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { 592:controlling_faction = 6 }
			}
			add_to_temp_variable = { GNG_pearls_controlled = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { 326:controlling_faction = 6 }
			}
			add_to_temp_variable = { GNG_pearls_controlled = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { 729:controlling_faction = 6 }
			}
			add_to_temp_variable = { GNG_pearls_controlled = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_Chinese_intervention
				check_variable = { GNG_pearls_controlled > 1 }
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.25 days = 2 }
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_Chinese_intervention
				check_variable = { GNG_pearls_controlled < 2 }
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.26 days = 2 }
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { GNG_pearls_controlled > 1 }
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.27 days = 2 }
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.28 days = 2 }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.31
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.31" }
	title = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.31.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.31.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_Song_Zhiguang_1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.31.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { times_visited_song > 1 } }
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.34 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = GNG_Song_Zhiguang_Ties_and_Relations
					has_country_flag = GNG_Song_Zhiguang_War_History
					has_country_flag = GNG_Song_Zhiguang_Previous_Postings
				}
				if = {
					limit = { check_variable = { GNG_investigated_song_events = 0 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.37 days = 1 }
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { check_variable = { GNG_investigated_song_events < 3 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.38 days = 1 }
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { check_variable = { GNG_investigated_song_events = 3 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.39 days = 1 }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.30 days = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

					hidden_effect = {
						country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.38 days = 1 }

					hidden_effect = {
						country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.39 days = 1 }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.30 days = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.33
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.33" }
	title = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.33.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.33.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_soviet_map

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.33.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { times_visited_song > 5 } }
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.36 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = GNG_Song_Zhiguang_Ties_and_Relations
					has_country_flag = GNG_Song_Zhiguang_War_History
					has_country_flag = GNG_Song_Zhiguang_Previous_Postings
				}
				if = {
					limit = { check_variable = { GNG_investigated_song_events = 0 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.37 days = 1 }
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { check_variable = { GNG_investigated_song_events < 3 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.38 days = 1 }
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { check_variable = { GNG_investigated_song_events = 3 } }
					hidden_effect = {
						country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.39 days = 1 }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.30 days = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.45
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.45" }
	title = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.45.t
	desc = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.45.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_GNG_Wang_Jingxu_3

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #RGOC Service
		name = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.45.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_Wang_Jingxu_RGOC_Service } }
		set_country_flag = GNG_Wang_Jingxu_RGOC_Service
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.46 days = 1 }
		}
	}
	option = { #He Yingqin
		name = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.45.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_Wang_Jingxu_He_Yingqqin } }
		set_country_flag = GNG_Wang_Jingxu_He_Yingqqin
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.47 days = 1 }
		}
	}
	option = { #Work in Guangdong
		name = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.45.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = GNG_Wang_Jingxu_Guangdong } }
		set_country_flag = GNG_Wang_Jingxu_Guangdong
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.48 days = 1 }
		}
	}
	option = { #Investigate Song
		name = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.45.d
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = GNG_Wang_Jingxu_RGOC_Service
			has_country_flag = GNG_Wang_Jingxu_He_Yingqqin
			has_country_flag = GNG_Wang_Jingxu_Guangdong
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_Song_Zhiguang_Investigated
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = GNG_Song_Zhiguang_Investigated
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.30 days = 1 }
		}
	}
	option = { #Close the Dossier
		name = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.45.e
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = GNG_Wang_Jingxu_RGOC_Service
			has_country_flag = GNG_Wang_Jingxu_He_Yingqqin
			has_country_flag = GNG_Wang_Jingxu_Guangdong
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.1 days = 1 }
		}
	}
}

			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_Wang_Jingxu_RGOC_Service
				has_country_flag = GNG_Wang_Jingxu_He_Yingqqin
				has_country_flag = GNG_Wang_Jingxu_Guangdong
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { GNG_investigated_wang_events = 0 } }
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.52 days = 1 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { GNG_investigated_wang_events < 3 } }
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.53 days = 1 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { GNG_investigated_wang_events = 3 } }
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.54 days = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = guangdong_RiotsChinaInvestigation.45 days = 1 }
			}
		}
	}
}

			}

##Custom Difficulty Stuff

country_event = { #Custom Difficulty Event
	id = GNG_CustomDifficulty.1
	title = GNG_CustomDifficulty.1.t
	desc = GNG_CustomDifficulty.1.desc

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { #
		name = GNG_CustomDifficulty.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		set_country_flag = GNG_hide_custom_difficulty_settings
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_enabled_higher_debt
			}
			set_temp_variable = { debt_temp = 3 }
			econ_national_debt_change = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_enabled_higher_growth_expectations
			}
			add_to_variable = { GNG_Base_Expected_Growth = 0.015 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_manchukuo_econ_buff
			}
			MAN = {
				set_country_flag = GNG_guarantee_manchukuo_sejima_margin_call
				set_temp_variable = { gdp_growth_temp = 0.8 }
				econ_gdp_growth_change = yes
				set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_GDP_boost_percentage = 0.05 }
				econ_GDP_boost_once_percentage = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GNG_enabled_lower_growth_expectations
			}
			add_to_variable = { GNG_Base_Expected_Growth = -0.01 }
		}
	}
}
